Reviews.Title: Didn't think I would like it.
Reviews.Author: John Vance
Reviews.Content: My first impresion of the iPad 1 was "it's stupid, don't need it".  About 2 weeks ago I had a heart attack and my Dr. Told me that I need to have a 1000 cal diet and work out a lot more.  Well I couldn't use my phone for the calory counting, too small.  Well I decided to buy iPad 2 and I was angry, but I knew I needed one for ONE reason is to count calories.  I've had it for about a week now, and I LOVE IT.  I really can't leave with ought it anymore. iPad 2 really is saving my life, with the apps to count my cal, my workout programs, and even my Dr. Can see what I eat and what I do at the gym.  I'm not going to talk about how cool it is to serf the web, and do business on it...  I have a 16 g white iPad.  If you are trying to decide if you want it or not, and you have the money for one,  GET IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Cameras are terrible
Reviews.Author: Johnny Dee
Reviews.Content: Great unit, but be aware, the cameras, even the better, forward-facing one--really bite. Why they couldn't use the camera from the current iPhone, which is quite good, on this $500+ product, is beyond me. It is a huge flaw in an otherwise mostly outstanding beast.  On a more minor note, the Apple tendency to design for profit instead of ease of use is always maddening. Case in point:  The built in memory costs $100 for each additional 16GBs.  My (non-iPhone) phone has a removable mini SD card that cost $9 for 16 GB, and I can add memory at will, for very little money. This could easily have been the Apple approach with the iPhone & iPad. A mini SD is the size of a fingernail. So I still buy Apple products because they are so good in so many ways, but the affordability thing is kind of ridiculous. Their computers are better than PCs, no question, but should not cost fully twice to three times what a comparable PC costs.

Reviews.Title: No Java!
Reviews.Author: amikeliunas
Reviews.Content: Most people are aware that iPads don't run Flash based content.IPad has its own YouTube browser to compensate for this design flaw.However, no one mentions that you can't run Java on an iPad or iPhone!!!There are still thousand of web sites and corporate applications running Java.Java is still #1 or #2 language in the world for developing applications.Because Apple had an internal war with Adobe and Sun, the consumers suffer and received a product that has a limited feature set.Check with this url [...]Steve Jobs has been quoted as saying "Java's not worth building in. Nobody uses Java anymore. It's this big heavyweight ball and chain."What is interesting to know is that Android phones and tables are running mostly Java applications... so Java is really not dead, but Apple is pretending to ignore the competition like they did in the 90's and think that Microsoft Windows was only a passing fad...

Reviews.Title: I got sucked in...oh well..it does some things well
Reviews.Author: M. C. Stith "frozintime"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for travel and business. The lightness and portability is cool, and it seems rather seamless until I went to use on my work websites...then oh no, they wouldnt work. Well, I went looking for apps....and guess what, there arent any for those websites. UGH! No updates, apps, or workarounds. Im stuck using it for emails and some websites, and a few apps. My mistake as I should have known they used Flash. Im just glad I didnt buy a 3G model or I really would have tossed more cash in the fire. I should have done better research, but figured there would be some sort of workaround, but there is not as of now. I would have been much better off with another of the competitors that used flash.Also there is very limited expandability. This is more of a gadget and not a computer or even a netbook. At least I can get on websites and use it with a netbook.It will allow me to stay connected through emails and some do some slow surfing, but thats really the extent of it.This is a very sad disappointment for business use....

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Matilde Lopez
Reviews.Content: Perfect.I Love de iPad, is great and my mom love itI like and i think it is wonderfull

Reviews.Title: Love it !!
Reviews.Author: Maureen Miller
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter.  She is a very responsible young user.  We live 800 miles apart and now she is able to talk to me through face time any time she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: flip flop
Reviews.Content: Works great!!!! 5 stars all day long!! Definitely a great deal for how much it's worth! Lasts a long time!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: ashlie
Reviews.Content: I got the iPad because I needed something smaller and easier to work on. I love it. The shipping could have been better because it took almost a month to get to me but it's great for school.

Reviews.Title: My 6 year old loves his new iPad
Reviews.Author: MOM OF  3 "AISHA"
Reviews.Content: So far my son hasn't had ANY ISSUES with this. It came in factory packaging just like all my other products purchased directly from Apple. Wifi works on his new 16gb+Verizon iPad great. I can't tell you about the Verizon connection yet because I have not connected him to the Verizon network yet. I'll keep you posted. This was purchased through Amazon - sold by The Raisin King but shipped by Amazon. My son's iPad seems to be 100% legit. Now we have 5 total Apple products in my household and they all work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Hard to please electronics person loves this!
Reviews.Author: Bruce F. Lester Jr. "War expert"
Reviews.Content: I thought that this would be another fad item, but I use it all the time.  I bought it to go overseas to use as my internet and ebook reader, but now I use it for everything.  You won't find a better product out there.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need!
Reviews.Author: SecretAsianSam
Reviews.Content: Really does what I need it to do, even though it is the 2nd generation.  64 Gb is really a huge amount, even for an apps hoarder like me.  Screen quality looks very good.  Can't really see much of a difference from a retina display (though I'm sure there is one, it still looks great as is).  Still a bit heavy (which is why they have made an iPad air), but if that doesn't bother you, it is still great.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Allaccess Gift Card "robert cawthon"
Reviews.Content: thank you very much I love this I pad 2 very own one day I buy another I pad 3

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: S. James "Sandy"
Reviews.Content: Arrived within two days, this iPad is in excellent condition.  Followed the sellers instructions for setting it up. This iPad does everything needed.  Excellent service and just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: As advertisement

Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase and came just as advertised! I would order again in the future when I need another IPAD!

Reviews.Title: Great service and product. It's what i expected
Reviews.Author: Jason Largent
Reviews.Content: Everything works on the Ipad as stated by seller. A few dents, but everything works on it. I really like the Ipad so far.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Mae Rudd
Reviews.Content: I was excited about my purchase. Didn't get a charger with my iPad but I was satisfied with it. I would purchase something again.

Reviews.Title: Wife is loving it.
Reviews.Author: Elton Hallock
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what we thought it would be and love it.  My wife is loving it very, very much.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: FRISCO
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my Mom and I could not beat the price for a new iPad.  I am very pleased because there is no worry about a fake product or warranty so therefore my Mom can enjoy worry free

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! =)
Reviews.Author: LadyBug
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad 2 - it came on time, VERY MINOR scratches (You would really have to look hard, to realize them), also came with the charger -(Does not come with the original box) but I really got a deal! And to add - the customer service with this seller was good as well. WAY TO GO! My son loves it..

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jiaen li
Reviews.Content: when i bought it the price is really good and valuable. later on the price was increased. I was so lucky.

Reviews.Title: Re:  IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Pat Freeman
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with this I-pad.  It is exactly what I was looking for.and am thankful that I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Locked iPad
Reviews.Author: L. Kelly
Reviews.Content: A great computer but the machine is locked.  Some other wiser iPad users have suspicions about the origin of this 'used' computer.  All I want is directions or help in unlocking.  What I can do on it is very good?

Reviews.Title: It's great in almost every way.
Reviews.Author: Critic
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad with one exception.  The whole thing works very well but they put a very cheap screen on it.  Today I knocked it off a table that is 17 inches high and the screen cracked.  Whatever it's made of is more delicate than glasses that have fallen off the table or other plastic screens on phones that have fallen farther.  I know someone else who had the screen crack.  So, I got a good 2 1/2 months out of it.

Reviews.Title: I Pad II
Reviews.Author: M Eileen Conlin
Reviews.Content: I like it, but there is a learning curve to use it. It came with NO instructions and I needed some.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mansfield Plumbing Company
Reviews.Content: Very Satisfied with the product that choose to purchase, great shipping packaged great will shop again and do recommend that you give this a try. My thanks go out to you sellers that care about your customers. Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Carol Jordan
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet! I had bought other brands, but will never use anything but an Apple again....It works great! Can't picture sitting in front of a computer anymore!

Reviews.Title: perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Nick Stargu
Reviews.Content: I found this product on amazon's website and found it to be perfect for my use. I actually enjoy using this more than my surface or my laptop. It allows me to watch many of my favorite shows on it for free and with the headphone plugged in, it sounds excellent too.

Reviews.Title: The best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Retia M. Hall
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect gift to get into the good graces of your mom, child and love ones and Amazon delivers on time

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Natalie G
Reviews.Content: I just got it in on Saturday, my kids just love it!!  I would too if they let me near it, it was just as described and is in great condition!!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality touch
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: The newer models have a  nicer screen and  the touch keyboard on this model is a little hard to  deal with.  There are some letters that require a harder touch

Reviews.Title: Well my sis Loves it
Reviews.Author: Kaylia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my little sister and she absolutely loves it.Biggest issue which is probably pretty big is the resolution of the camera... No product should carry .92 mega pixels! Really Apple?

Reviews.Title: Out with the old...
Reviews.Author: CaliVEGAN
Reviews.Content: It is really unfortunate that the iPad 2 is being discontinued. I personally love my iPad and couldn't see living without it. Maybe years to come I will update it, but I see no need to rush out and send over $600 on a newer version when mine is just as good. So I bought one for my mom so she could be somewhat up to date with technology lol.Smart buy...

Reviews.Title: Terrible Screen
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: When I received the device it was functional, but that screen was separating from the device and had to be replace.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Lance L. Logan "L Logan"
Reviews.Content: I was recently reminded how cool iPads are when I was forced to work with a bunch of Kindle Fire's.  You can't really compare the two except for maybe form factor.  I'm sure the Kindle must do something better, but I didn't find it.  Sorry Amazon ;)

Reviews.Title: IPad is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Glenda Mayberry
Reviews.Content: The IPad 2 met all my expectations and more! Fast uploading, light and easy to use. Love the app store!

Reviews.Title: Better condition than my new one.
Reviews.Author: D. Dunton "DrDaved"
Reviews.Content: Found this a "refurbished" IPAD for less than the cost of some used ones. It arrived and it is in better condition than my new one. the screen is super clear and the apps are all up-to-date. The welcome section guided my wife through an Apple ID with no difficulty and her started rolling in about 10 min. after I started the setup. Reviews.Author: ChristyAnn
Reviews.Content: This iPad is working great.  Thought I was having trouble with it.  Turned out the problem was with my wireless router.  I upgraded my router and all worked well.  It takes more throughput to run the iPad than to run my laptop, so the it took me a while to troubleshoot since I was still using my laptop wirelessly every day.  I would reset the general settings on iPad, and it would be able to connect to the internet for a bit.  There was an update that I needed, but it crashed the whole thing every time I tried to download it.  Bought a new modem/wireless router at Officemax, hooked all up, and everything is working great! Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi + SORT OF AT&T;
Reviews.Author: M. Z. Rhoades "Zane"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this particular model because I lost the one I received as a gift.  I don't want the person who gave it to me to find out about the loss.  Also, I cannot afford a new one from Apple.  I chose the vendor Sikksound because of the positive reviews.  I am conditionally pleased with my choice.  The iPad I received was in pristine condition, with an Apple box, charging cord and fast charge plug.  It also came with a textured protective backing.  I discovered that the iPad had been used in Italy because of the formatting and information I found in the settings.  After a series of very courteous and helpful e-mail conversations with Sikksound, I was able to resolve the formatting issues.However, I warn purchasers of used AT&T; iPads of an expensive and cumbersome complication.  AT&T; uses a SIM card to enable cellular data usage.  When sold by Apple, a new AT&T; iPad comes with a SIM card which allows for periodic data usage.  In other words, a cellular data plan may be purchased through the iPad for a month, and then cancelled.  When cellular data is needed again, one can simply by more data for that month, and so on.  Because of it's Italian heritage the iPad I received was equipped with a SIM card incompatible with AT&T; in the U.S.  In order for the iPad to use cellular data, a new AT&T; SIM card was required.  A local AT&T; store installed one without alerting me to the $36 fee, and without explaining that the monthly data plan must be ongoing, or the SIM card is deactivated.  A replacement SIM card from AT&T; is not renewable, like the one which comes in a new iPad from Apple.  The AT&T; store rep deactivated the SIM card within a few minutes after explaining that the data plan must be ongoing.  I only discovered the $36 charge when my bill arrived.  Luckily AT&T; removed it because I had not used any data.I rarely use cellular data because wi-if is so accessible.  However, for those who want to use occasionally use the cellular capability, you might want to do some more research.  I recommend spending time on the phone with, or visiting an Apple store, to find out your cellular data options.

Reviews.Title: perfect apple product for my 3 year old
Reviews.Author: Mrs Fluffurs ":)"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 3 year old son as an upgrade to his ipad 1. He has been very proficient at using ipad from a very early age. itunes store has a huge selection of learning apps for his age group and younger. My son has been a ipad and ipod user sinc he was about 9 months old, he thinks he is playing, but he is really learning. He is way ahead of where he should be and he has had a ton of fun doing it. After ios 6&7 came out his ipad 1  was no longer able to keep up with the technology of the upgraded apps. I purchased the 64g ipad 2 so he would have plenty of room for his apps since some of the apps can be large downloads. i am able to also to limit what he is able to do in settings and the app store. He can only get apps ifi unlock it. ipad 2 was easy to child lock certain features and content. ipad 2's long battery is great on trips, it keeps him busy and i dont need active wifi for his apps to work. I wish that ipad existed with my other children. I like that he is learning on current to future technology that most daycares or preschools can not provide.  I recommend this to any parent. The ecpense is worth it. A childs education id priceless. ipad 2 is perfect for facilitating that.TJ

It was shipped immediately and received right on time.

Reviews.Title: Buying a used iPad2
Reviews.Author: Christiane Fox
Reviews.Content: Bought it used and spent hours on line with Apple to discover that the operating system had not been updated. Therefore I could not receive/send email or use the internet. A more computer saavy person than I might have caught onto the problem faster than I did, but with no Apple experience, I was pretty lost.So buying a used tablet with no literature wasn't ideal for me.

Reviews.Title: It's a 'love, hate relationship'
Reviews.Author: George Clark
Reviews.Content: I tired years ago of trying to figure out the nuances of different computer systems. I love Macs, so why does this thing seem almost alien in comparison? From email to the internet, everything is similar but different at the same time. Perhaps if I used it as often as my home computer, I wouldn't be so clumsy with it. All that aside, it's a beautiful machine and wouldn't trade it for any other pad.

Reviews.Title: Incredible!
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Jones
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems or issues with this item and, while there was some very minor damage to one corner on the pad, the cost paid as compared to a new unit was just unbelievable. Also with no shipping charges. I will be using  Amazon for most, if noy all, fugure purchases.

Reviews.Title: An oversized cell phone . . .
Reviews.Author: Juliet
Reviews.Content: As long as you know how limited the iPad is, going in (compared with competing devices with full operating systems),  then you probably won't be sad. You won't miss Flash or the ability to manage your files or be productive with any ease. If you just want iTunes, some games, and some Internet surfing, the iPad is great, but if you want all of that plus something fully operational, you'll need to buy a competitor's brand. The iPad is pretty, though--which is what Apple does best. My husband and I have 2.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Robert Tator
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the wife. She loves it. She uses it for games, facebook, mail, internet, and face to face time. Many of our friends and relatives also have.

Reviews.Title: Rating for my ipad
Reviews.Author: K. Wilcox
Reviews.Content: I think it had more scratches than divulged, and it bothered me that another brand cord was with it. I would have LOVED to have had a book/instructions with it, but I know that was too much to hope for;)The store performed as promised with shipping dates. It was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Felicia R Rowe
Reviews.Content: I love this ipad.  However, if I purchase another one, I will purchase one with service with one of the major carriers.  It isvery inconvenient to activate my hot spot on my smartphone to use the internet.  I can do so much on my ipad.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Robbin Murray
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday present for my son and he just loves it.  We are very pleased with this product Robbin Murray

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jaffster211
Reviews.Content: This is one amazing thing it's great for games travel gps you name it it does it I would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Strang Gang
Reviews.Content: Just what my husband needed. I bought it for him because he is on the road a lot and it was hard to see all the pictures and video's of our Grandchildren on his iPhone. He just loves it for that and of course the other uses, but the Grandkids are the most important thing, LOL!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Marilyn K. Bither
Reviews.Content: grandson liked it for his birthday...so I do too!  With the way it was refurbished for us...It fits the bill!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Elsa Gatto
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad.  I use it often for the internet, games and videos.  Although I've had it for close to one year, I am still learning all the features on it.  I enjoy traveling with it and hope to use it on my next trip out of the country.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Juanita
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband,mainly to play games on. Sorry it wasn't 3G but it meets all his expectations. He likes the wifi feature.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Jayden17 "JD"
Reviews.Content: 16GB, wifi only. This was purchased for a friend, but she has had no complaints so far, she loves it. It is working as expected and was delivered quite quickly. I recommend this iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Trina Snyder
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband to get him off the big laptop, took him a little while to finally start using it more and now he likes it a lot better

Reviews.Title: Isn't isn't terrible....
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Just limited. I can efficiently: Check email, surf the Internet, and play games. I can inefficiently: Edit Word documents and retain the formatting for the document. Numbers is inadequate if you want to do any meaningful work in a spreadsheet. I don't use Apple products, except for an iPhone, and moving back and forth from Microsoft to the iPad is just a pain.

Reviews.Title: Yahoo!!
Reviews.Author: Dabigragu9971
Reviews.Content: Thanks for the ipad at the great price! My Mother-In-Law will be most pleased! Especially after she figures out how to even use it.....Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: not the latest but...
Reviews.Author: Paul Thompson
Reviews.Content: it does what it does. it is not the latest of units, but it is well designed. geat for reading text. I use it for reading music & writing notes.

Reviews.Title: Favorite product in the world!
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Wow I debated on an iPad for so long! I had a really small laptop but I always dreamed of an iPad. I finally took the plunge and would never give it back. Yes, it is pricy but is so worth it!! I mainly use mine for Facebook, shopping, Internet banking, and playing candy crush. It is a great convenience to just turn it on and start using. No worrying about loading or starting up. The picture is hd and crystal clear. If you need a keyboard they make Bluetooth ones. I would buy a newer one but mine is still going great !

Reviews.Title: Very fast...
Reviews.Author: George L. Danielewski
Reviews.Content: Very good little computer but the battery life is not to long...  Also manual would help and cut down on guess work...George D. Langhorne , PA

Reviews.Title: excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The ipad came quickly, in great shape (only some small dents on the back) and works perfectly. If it wasn't for the dents, you would have been hard pressed to tell it was used. Good company to buy from and I recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an ipad 2. After comparing features and battery life this model suited me best. Finding a good price on a brand new in the box took awhile but finally I found this one and I am enjoying using this ipad 2 for 3 to 4 days without having to recharge it.

Reviews.Title: great screen quality
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I would not call it light years ahead of their prior version but it is still a nice unit.the screen quality and the picture quality is astounding.It has the usual ease of usability that we have come to love and apple has set the new standard in reliability.  HP can learn a lot from apple.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Louise Rittmiller "Louise MSN RN"
Reviews.Content: Love it love it love it love it. It takes great pictures and I can stay connected to the Internet wherever there is WiFi.

Reviews.Title: IPAD for Elderly Mom
Reviews.Author: Michelle Lane
Reviews.Content: I bought this Ipad for my mom who is 88 years old.  It is fab and she loves it for her email, since she can sit in her comfortable chair and check her email and write short notes back.

Reviews.Title: any problem.
Reviews.Author: LEAVES
Reviews.Content: this is very perfect except the price, but i just kidding. i like apple production....they are the best, just buy it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!!!
Reviews.Author: artgarden
Reviews.Content: It was perfect! In the original box. Not a scratch on it.  It is great.  These people are too wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This iPad is really excellent! I am so happy with it as it does even way more than I expected. I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Recommend product and Seller!
Reviews.Author: raelyn0511
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad! I got it basically for school and Netflix, and I use it for so much more too! I recommend this product and seller to everyone. Chose 2 day shipping and came to my house from UPS on time. Came in brand new and undamaged with the film still on the iPad and everything. If you have the money to spend on it, I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Becky Buckler
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace one that only had Wifi.  Now I am able to access the information I need even in places where Wifi is not available.  If I can use my cell phone, I can use my iPad!

Reviews.Title: tootie
Reviews.Author: tootie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the person who received it was very happy.  She has used it now for two months and no problem with the product. Yes I would recommend this company in the future.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Morse "cynmor"
Reviews.Content: It's been a real time saver and occupier for my child. Thank you for the smooth machine. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: chris stern
Reviews.Content: Terrific buy; I love this iPad! Nasty scratch on screen but I can live with it.....so happy to finally own an iPad...thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just "meh".
Reviews.Author: Jessie Ivey
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have gotten a newer model. I pretty much have given up on this thing, so many apps that I would like to have don't work because it's outdated. I love the iPad in general and still plan to keep it for a while, but it's functionality leaves a lot to be desired. The NPR app works perfectly which is really great, and I mostly just use it for portfolio purposes and if I don't feel like carrying around a bulky laptop. Please listen to folks who tell you that this is not a replacement for a laptop, they are not lying. Seriously. Don't get rid of your damn laptop.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous- what a great Ipad for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Happy Girl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since I just wanted an IPAd 2 for fun, so why pay for a new one? The price was amazing but I got skeptical after reading some of the seller's reviews.  I wrote the seller myself and was reassured of the product.  It came in 2 days, was well wrapped, it was called Very Good condition- a few scratches on the back, but basically perfect.  It came with an older cover ($40.00 is what it said, but definatley not worth that today, but hey it's a cover), 2 charge cords, clean and working perfectly.  I just ran up to TJ Max to get a new cover- and it really looks like a brand new IPAd for about half the price!  I know I got a very good deal and was happy to have the seller write back immediately for all my concerns, making sure that I was pleased with the product. Don't know what happened to others, but I am very pleased with this product and the responses of the seller.  This was a great deal and I am enjoying every second of my "new" ipad for a great price.  Just get the seller's  email and ask questions if you have them- I feel they were very helpful  and concerned.  Even though this was cheap , it is still a major purchase for me and I feel that this purchase was made in confidence and carried through exceeding my expections.  Thanks IPAD MANIA!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: This exactly what I wanted and the price was great. There were no defects with it only thing was the USB part of the charger was not original so it charged slow but I got a real one and now it charges in a shorter time and the battery last a long time. This was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Jere Mullen "Jere"
Reviews.Content: Decided to update and give iPad 1 to hubby ...  I Like books so I wanted the biggest one.  I don't play games so I wasn't worried about the visual technology for the 3 or 4. When I started looking Apple didn't sell anything but the 16 GB ... When I looked on Amazon I found what I was looking for Amazon never let's me down. Brand new in original unopened packaging great deal!

Reviews.Title: LOve Love Love it!
Reviews.Author: kim d. "KD"
Reviews.Content: This has to be the best purchase I have made in years!I love my Ipad! I didn't even know how to operate one when I gotit and now I take it everywhere I go!

Reviews.Title: Great product great Seller
Reviews.Author: douglas litchfield
Reviews.Content: i am very happy with the Ipad 2 and with this seller.  I was hesitant to buy an Ipad online and from someone other than the Apple Store.  I was very relieved when i received this product undamaged and earlier than expected.  I would highly recommend buy from them again

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Justine Robertson
Reviews.Content: The I pad does everything that a new one would have. It came in great condition and I really am loving it so far!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly well. I prefer the apple iPad to any tablet in the market. I have bought for more than 6 people.

Reviews.Title: Just as described
Reviews.Author: Erika Lynn Brotzman "e"
Reviews.Content: Product arrived early. Works great. Few cosmetic scratches, but that was explained in description before I purchased it and the cover hides those scratches. The seller makes an effort to make sure the customer is happy with product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Wanda Parnell
Reviews.Content: I love Apple. Hard to beat. I bought this one for my sister. Now she won't be borrowing mine. Worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: nice for the price
Reviews.Author: H. D. Martinez "Pastor Danny"
Reviews.Content: There was a keyboard that came along with it but it was defective. When I contacted the owner, he stated that it was merely a bonus, therefore he couldn't fix.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Peggy Meany
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about trying an Ipad because I have always used a windows based computer. The transition went smoothly. It has been very easy to adapt. Amazon was very good to deal with. I had a slight issue at first and customer service stepped up and fixed everything immediately.

Reviews.Title: addictive
Reviews.Author: F. Smith
Reviews.Content: Never thought I'd have a need for a tablet. Since I bought this, I haven't put it down. Love the Cloud network that syncs this with my iPad. That's a cool innovation.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: busy mom
Reviews.Content: Just as expected the only thing making it look used was the scratched off inscription, which is covered by the case. No problems and even received early.

Reviews.Title: The best purchase I've ever done
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Beasley
Reviews.Content: I know the results will vary, but this was the absolute best purchase I've ever made!! The iPad was completely like new! Not a single scratch front or back! They shipped fast too. I was very please over all, and this was definely a good buy!!!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Michele Cross
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad, it more than satisfied my expectations but my grandson has taken over possession of it! When I finally get to use it it's GREAT,

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is a great Ipad in wonderful shape. This is my second one I have a 32gb I wanted one with more memory the 64gb this the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: L. McCombs
Reviews.Content: I was a holdout in getting an ipad, but now I can't live without it! I'm spending way too much time on it now! Kindle books are easy to get, games are awesome, and the quick access to Facebook and email is wonderful! Definitely a keeper!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jansu831
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about the iPad?  Worth the extra money to get this one with the camera on it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: bbo
Reviews.Content: I mainly use it to process credit cards for my business, skyping with family and friends, and learning games for the kids. I have downloaded a ton of games and it still has a lot of space left, and having the camera is great!

Reviews.Title: Love, love love it!!
Reviews.Author: Good
Reviews.Content: I really really like my Ipad.  It is so light and easy to take on trips.  And my grandkids are also hooked on it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: shirley p. cox
Reviews.Content: The iPad lets me be mobile using it as my computer anywhere at home or when I travel, surfing the internet, taking photos with it, keeping up with email, skyping - anything I could do on my desktop computer I can do on my iPad. I can hook it to the tv to watch  movies, if I want. It is super light weight and easy to  carry around.

Reviews.Title: amazing for the price...
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: i just bought this ipad 2 on the may 19th  and i got on the 22nd i recieved it fast and i am very pleased with this it and it is a 32 gb and the price was 314.00 that was a great price and i got it just in time because i got the last one but i only paid 300.00 because of the money i had saved on my account and bought some cases and other items with the money on my account it said used but it only had 3 marks on it 1 on the screen and 2 on the back it was like new to me just for 3 marks thats nothing and coming from a andorid tablet to an ipad it feels amazing and i love it... once again i paid 300.00  but the price was 314.00 for a ipad 2 32gb used.  AMAZING AND WONDERFUL....

Reviews.Title: Used iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Nixon Peter
Reviews.Content: The item was shipped faster than I thought and is in good condition. It came with the charger and cable as described but with scratches on the back which were pretty intense. Though if it's in the iPad cover  it can't be noticed coz the screen is in perfect condition. All in all the item was and still is good!

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Patricia M Marshall
Reviews.Content: GOOD QUALITY, EXACTLY WHAT WAS ADVERTISED.  WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO FRIENDS.  I REALLY LIKE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE PRODUCT AS WELL.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: forevablessed13
Reviews.Content: Heard of all the iPads that were made this was the best generation of them all, I even saw the drop test & the battery test on YouTube, over all this was a better purchase. And I'm still enjoying it till now!!!

Reviews.Title: Omg I love it
Reviews.Author: Tia LaFlesh
Reviews.Content: We travel and have medical appointments all over two states and  this has allowed my to take my college class with me while staying in touch with my family while we r away

Reviews.Title: I love it..
Reviews.Author: Stan Kent
Reviews.Content: Best thing I could have bought for myself.  I use it for so much.  Speakers could be betters and louder.  Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who does not want to lug a laptop around everywhere.

Reviews.Title: unbelievable product
Reviews.Author: Fenderman27
Reviews.Content: apple has done it again. the ipad is an absolutely incredible learning tool and makes it easy to have a computer anywhere you go

Reviews.Title: Perfect quality & price. Fits iPad 2/3/4
Reviews.Author: Zeljko Delic
Reviews.Content: I own 4 different models and I’m very satisfied with everything: quality, design, features and price! I would like to recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: g
Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: this ipad works great, a bit battered from their corners and difficulties with charger ... the sent with a charger who did not work .... but otherwise'm happy ...

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Works great! Have had no issues! Got it at a great price! Everything worked great right outa the box. I'm glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Alex Argitis
Reviews.Content: this product has filled all my expectations as it meets what I need for that reason I understand that the purchase was successful

Reviews.Title: Excellent Gift
Reviews.Author: Sports Guy
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and  it is perfect. I really liked the features including the photo options. Battery life is good, in fact I am doing this review using my iPad. Great for emails, Internet, photos, and videos. The best thing is it simple and very portable.  Perfect gift to receive.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase I have made
Reviews.Author: Robin D. Edmon "musiccrazy"
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time before I brought the iPad, looked around and researched. The price was right and it is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: OKAY.......BUT
Reviews.Author: Vickie H Asamoah
Reviews.Content: Can not download adobeflasher which I need in almost every process, freezes up frequently and changing from app to application it just turns off!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Knapp
Reviews.Content: Fast and dependable. Easy to use.  Only down side is its not compatible with many down loads for listing to music online or silver lite which I needed for a website I was trying to take a test on.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2 att 3g wifi
Reviews.Author: anacortez01
Reviews.Content: work really well - and great price for ipad - only needed lcd replaces and sim crad reader fixed . didnt cost to much to fix thank you uarizona

Reviews.Title: So sweet ( He really cared)
Reviews.Author: chelsie park
Reviews.Content: Product sent was better than described. He described it as in very good shape- I would say excellent (like new) It was in the original packaging. He threw a new cover also.I was very pleased!! Than he followed up! I felt like he was professional, and he cared.I hopefully will get to do business with them again:)Chelsie

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: FRED DAW
Reviews.Content: Is awesome, so good, my little dougther just love it. The battery is for just all day and is exactly what i wanted.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Joserlande
Reviews.Content: It works well and it's very fast, I'm actually glad I brought it and I am enjoying it, I receive it more quicker then I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Tool!
Reviews.Author: okcmech11
Reviews.Content: This ipad is a great tool for our service technicians. This allows them to view larger print and more detail than the iphone screen.

Reviews.Title: apple ipad 2 just awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: MetalleriUM
Reviews.Content: at this time it could be old but still very good tablet, better than others that is suppose to be faster and cheaper but they are just laggy and plastic i know because i had many tablets in my hands and i dont really need widgets or the unused flash (html5 is today with us and is the future)..... Ipad2 still best tablet for a price today!!

Reviews.Title: For somebody else.
Reviews.Author: Vanesa
Reviews.Content: It was a last minute order and I was scared it would not arrive before my trip to Argentina but, in TWO DAYS it was at my door. Excellent service!

Reviews.Title: good product.
Reviews.Author: MaddyRo
Reviews.Content: Good product. Fast shipping. Very happy with sale. Bought it for my husband for our anniversary and he was very happy with the ipad

Reviews.Title: My Ipad
Reviews.Author: Mombo_Moe
Reviews.Content: I'm just loving it. I use it for photo clients and it is just great! I use it mostly in the field.

Reviews.Title: fast and clean
Reviews.Author: sejet "sejet"
Reviews.Content: I now have a ipad 1, 2, and 3.  One for every room in the house, one for email two for every thing else.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: jamie hoops
Reviews.Content: a lot better than the ipad 1 in many ways including being able to watch shows using multiple video players.

Reviews.Title: Do I need a laptop anymore?
Reviews.Author: Asakwe Sanga
Reviews.Content: With my interest in photos, music and instant communication, this is the right gadget. I like travelling, with its accessibility to Google map, this is what have been looking for.

Reviews.Title: not perfect
Reviews.Author: itsokay
Reviews.Content: yes the device i received is acceptable. However while the advertisement says it is an at&t; device it actually is verizon. If there is a way to change the network on the device without going through the hassle of returning it please let me know. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love my ipad
Reviews.Author: marylouise Reyes,
Reviews.Content: My ipad is the best!  Came in perfect condition and it contains all my favorite books and music that more space to spare.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Brian Tapparo
Reviews.Content: very easy to operate fast at downloading and very convient when i dont have a computer at my access great product

Reviews.Title: iPad works great!
Reviews.Author: Naej
Reviews.Content: The iPad works great! The only issues I have is it is not comparable to get kindle bookson amazon.  Some of of my apps did not sync up together either but overall the IPad works really well and I have no other issues.

Reviews.Title: my first iPad
Reviews.Author: D. Doyle
Reviews.Content: this was my first iPad and my friends had all said I would love it.  I wasn't so sure, but I trusted their opinions and got one.  I do love it and wish I knew all the things it can do.  I need to find an Apple store near me to go with my thousands of questions.  I did a live chat once about it, and they were wonderful in helping me understand what to do out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Derrick Carter
Reviews.Content: Only the one product you'll ever find. Cost cheaper than the latest one, iPad 3rd generation, plus you can take it any where on the go! There is nothing else to say but it's a great product! One of a kind!

Reviews.Title: So excited that I have my ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad 2.  I have a small jewelry business and now able to accept debit and credit cards using my ipad 2, as a result of this my sales have doubled!  I also use my ipad 2 when I travel, I can get quick directions and find hotels and places of interest.  I no longer have to lug around my laptop computer,

Reviews.Title: I Love this Gadget!
Reviews.Author: Richard Anderson "Rick Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I love this thing...use it constantly.  Wi-Fi works really well.  It keeps me from running into the next room to check for emails all the time.  It's small.  it's convenient and well worth the price.  I have not had any problems with my ipad..

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE IPAD !!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Dardon
Reviews.Content: Apple is the best ...bought the ipad for work does everything it was intended for ..great resolution fast response ..size a little annoying definitely will consider mini !! Better yet it paid for itself in its first week!!!!just by posting ads online ...dardin810@gmail.com ..email me and I can tell you how I paid for my ipad it's first week !!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my husband on a budget. I have an iPad already but he wanted one as well. It came in very fast and in wonderful condition! He thought it was brand new! I obviously did good! Lol. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: rdav
Reviews.Content: The touch screen worked reasonably well.  Needed to buy a screen guard to view the screen outdoors, but haven't had any other problems so far.  This was a refurbished unit, so there were some scratches on the case as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Still a powerful tool
Reviews.Author: Mark J
Reviews.Content: This was my choice for a first-time tablet user who has a similar one in her household. It meets her needs very well.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. I especially wanted it to create documents, transfer documents from my laptop, and to do my sermons and presentations on. It really has been great! My only criticism is that Apple doesn't have a warranty on it.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: sulekwi
Reviews.Content: What can I say. I enjoy my iPad so much that I ended up buying two more of them  it would be to your advantage to buy one with more memory if you are a photo enthusiast like myself .

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 review
Reviews.Author: John N. Churchill
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new iPad 2.  It'll take a while to explore all of the possibilities.  But it is already a useful thing to have.

Reviews.Title: Better than described!
Reviews.Author: Tera Williams
Reviews.Content: The iPad was in even better condition than described. It works perfectly and looks great. I'm using It to write this review :)

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Bought these for my wife's Ipad. She loves it. They make it easy to clean spills and wipe things off of it.

Reviews.Title: This tablet was a gift for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: She absolutely loves it, She she says is easy to use and she use it 24/7. The price was right too

Reviews.Title: apple ipad
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Nicholson
Reviews.Content: Love it so much fun use it everyday. Would recomend to all.It is easy to use and you get a lot of free aps

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my daughter and she carries it everywhere
Reviews.Author: Charles Wright
Reviews.Content: Not an Apple fan, but my daughter is. She uses her iPad more than her laptop now. She wouldn't know what to do without it.

Reviews.Title: Its white! :D
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love white things.iPad its usefull, thin, fast and simple to use. There is no way to go wrong with this tabletYou'll notice the difference.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Device for book reding and Net Surfing

Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected.  Great price for Gen 2 without 3G. This is my 1st Apple product and I am going to only buy Apple from now on.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Echavarria
Reviews.Content: I'm writing to express how satified I am with my iPad.  I think it was one of the best investments I have ever made, I pratically use it for everything writing papers  for college, music, photos, videos, surfing the wed, games and email. My iPad has practically replaced my two laptops.  I'm not recommending to get rid of your laptop and get an iPad because there are certain things I can not  do on my iPad that only my laptop can do the job, but you should definately get one for its portability, accessibility and great battery life.  I was so impressed with my Ipad I went out and purchased an ipad mini this was in a 3 month period. Also plan to upgrade my regular ipad for the new edision with 120gs and my laptop with an Mac Air. I really like Apple products and wish I would have taken advantage of their products sooner.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Jyri Ketola
Reviews.Content: It was a good find, reasonable price and excellent condition. It has been very usefull and filled all my expectations. Only problem is, that there are so many features which you don't use so often and then you forgot how to use them. That's ofcourse more like a personal problem..

Reviews.Content: The price was right, the iPad perfect.  A "complaint"?  Yes.  I don't apprecitate the little ad's that show up!  And why no user's guide?  If it weren't for some friends with an iPad2 for help, I don't know what I would be doing right now.

Reviews.Title: ipad

Reviews.Content: We got our grand son an ipad of his own for his last birthday (6).  He had played with mine every time he came over so it was an easy gift to give.  He knows how to maneuver around.  I did get a more sturdy case for it recently.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Greg Bushman
Reviews.Content: Wife loves this, she uses it all the time.  Great investment.  everyone should own one, I might even buy another

Reviews.Title: More of a play toy :\
Reviews.Author: karis jones "K.Jones"
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is generally well responsive and quick however there are a few malfuctions/weak points where it could of been made better. I test out tablets/ e-readers because I need them for school/coursework however The Apple Ipad has poor buisness apps and tools. The notes apps are very basic and less focused on. Apple mainly foucuses on its apps and games which attract the younger population. For example it has more Angry Birds Apps then your fingers on your hand! Some strong points are the Facebook app, Facetime(Similar to Skype) and Itunes. Not my taste of tablet and I will be selling it soon.

Reviews.Content: i got this ipad for my birthday and i love it it is amazing it does just about everthing i want but it does not come with a user guide you have to download that yourself otherwise i reccomend it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I use for the kids when we're traveling. I load movies & games into it so the kids have something to do on long drives & flights.

Reviews.Content: Love the iPad product. the battery lasts as long as it says it does and sometimes more than expected. getting apps and videos loaded are easy. I love the white color too.

Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my daughte-in-law and she was really very happy with the Apple iPad 2 MC981LL/A Tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Reviews.Content: Being disabled, I find it hard to get to my computer much. Now I can receive and answer email, read, check out the news and play games from my chair. It doesn't do all my computer can, but it has sure been a great help!

I will say it works flawlessly, great picture, not all apps work to full screen on it yet. I also own a Samsung galaxy tab 2, which I feel is way better for the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Buenísimo

Reviews.Content: Esta tabletas son una maravilla, fue para un regalo para mi novia y aún no la puedo despegar de el una excelente elección, aunque recomiendo las que tienen 3G

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad II
Reviews.Author: T.K. Rairden
Reviews.Content: Thrilled with this iPad. Great price. Perfect.  Friends can not believe what a great deal I had received on this.

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Preston
Reviews.Content: Love it! Nothing wrong with it all. Has changed my life. Best apps for my son who is really the one I bought it for but I use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is great!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Ibanez
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves it and has never stopped using since. Can't go wrong with Apple computer products most of the time.

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Content: Muy buen producto y entrega a tiempo , lo recomiendo , calidad y servicio , very good, excelente . .

Reviews.Title: Excellent, works very well.

Reviews.Content: It is great, took a trip to South America and facetimed with my wife.  FREE!!  It is awesome!!  I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Julius Michael
Reviews.Content: It meets my expectations. It is really the brand I like and I feel very much comfortable using this one.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 is good but not great.
Reviews.Author: J. Chang
Reviews.Content: First, I am tech savvy. I mainly use a PC. I have owned an iphone before. Don't use macs. This is my first ipad. It was given to me as a gift. I use android based phones.My impression is that the ipad is very much like the iphone. Exactly the way you get into the phone you do the ipad. The icons are identical. So if you're coming from those other devices it's nice to have the same icons that you're already familiar with.Overall I'm happy with the unit. My only real complaints are the camera, speakers, no siri and lack of microsd card slot. The camera is horrible. I was shocked to learn the mexapixel that comes stock on this device. I don't think it's even 1 megapixel but for taking pictures it's really bad. Very grainy. Video recording is in hd so when the video does come out the picture is good quality. But the camera pictures are horrible.The speakers are mono. I'm not sure why they are mono on such a flagship device. They sound ok but i figured you would at least get stereo speakers with something that costs over $400.Lack of microsd slot. Now this is really bad. iphones dont have them either. neither do their ipods. it's a great way for apple to make more money since you can't upgrade the storage capacity. Android tablets and phones I'm able to add up to 64gb of extra storage. So with this device I'm locked in to what storage I buy. That's apple's deal so take it or leave it.No siri. Upgrading to os 6 I thought that I would at least get siri. No. Apple won't allow that. Kinda sad for their once top of the line tablet. Ok but not really a big deal. Just would have been a nice feature.If I were in the market for a new tablet now, I would seriously consider the Samsung Note 10.1. It can do everything the new ipad can do and more.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 best way to go
Reviews.Author: Kamron Wilson
Reviews.Content: 64 G. Great product. No lag, easily starts up and runs fast! I suggest to anyone considering getting an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Burum
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my daughter, and she tells me it is one of the best presents she ever received.  I also received an iPad for Christmas, so we communicate through them almost every day.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Laura Harshbarger "Laura H"
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of purchasing a refurbished product but have had it for about a year and it is still in great shape.  Looked completely new when I got it.  So addicted to my iPad 2.  Purchased New Trent case with keyboard and use it like a mini laptop.

Reviews.Title: Always great but Ipad 2 should get some upgrades by now
Reviews.Author: Hard Metal "Hard metal"
Reviews.Content: I bought IPad 2 as a gift for my wife.  We have 1st gen IPad that we got when Ipad came out first time.  Still works good with some lagging now days but it works good.  IPad 2 works pretty good but I just think there are so many better one out there now days with a lot cheaper price.  I love apple products but tablets pricing has gone down so much that IPad is just getting too expensive.  There are 10 inch tablet from Google Nexus 10 with better spec than latest Ipad and it's cheaper than Ipad 2 that I bought.  I see so many other companies such as Idolian with their Studio 10 that works better than IPad 2 and cost only $250.  Ii think Apple is great product but I think they need to get in the game with more reasonable price.  BTW, I'm returning this iPad and getting Studio 10 or Nexus 10.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: ReeRee "Sisters Rock Abu Dhabi"
Reviews.Content: Likes - pretty much replaces my iphone and laptop for daily online activitiesDislikes - none!Recommend - for anyone who loves Apple products

Reviews.Title: So good

Reviews.Content: I think that these goods, it is of very good quality. Satisfacio my needs and my iPad still had it very well

Reviews.Title: my  new tablet doter

Reviews.Content: My dother wants a tablet from apple and we decide to buy in this way. The  tablet arrives on time and in perfect conditions.

Reviews.Content: Coming from an Ipod 4, the bigger screen was a great update! Love how easy it is go into all the apps and love how solid the ipad was built. Lighter than the ipad 4 and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Content: It woorks good for the moment! Ipad 2 has a nice color,works fast,not heavy, very convinient to take notes at work!

Reviews.Content: THE UNIT IS AMAZING! IT WAS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR MY GIRLFRIEND AND SHE LOVE IT. HER LAPTOP IS NOW YESTERDAY!

Reviews.Title: Handy!!!
Reviews.Author: Vivianna Enriquez
Reviews.Content: Apple fan here!!! And love electronics! Music, videos, and it just comes in handy. And portable. Keeps me connected with family.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: A great product, with the wi-fi keyboard it takes care of everything that I would have used my laptop for.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: FingerLakes33
Reviews.Content: II like the Apple Ipad better than other tablets since the operating system is so much more friendly. I have an android phone and do not like the Android operating system on a tablet. The Safari search engine works very well and is easy to navigate. The applications and all iTunes store are great for anyone. The battery life lasts a long time too.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: SAndy
Reviews.Content: I have had my ipad for less than a month and do not know how I got by without it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Handy
Reviews.Author: D. Oppenheim
Reviews.Content: I really like this iPad. I just couldn't give it 5 stars because the display looks alot less sharp than my iPhone 4S. I know this does not have the retina display, which is why, but it just still irritates me a bit when I use it. If I knew the new iPad would have been out soon, I would have held out on buying this until the new iPad with the retina display was out. Anyway, this iPad is still useful. I use it mostly for reading/writing emails and surfing the web while sitting on the couch. Sometimes I use Facetime which works well since my Wifi connection is fast. This thing runs smoothly and is pretty fast. The games for iPad are pretty fun to play on thing as well. Also, I find the camera is not all that great indoors and most of my indoor photos look grainy. Overall a good product but not the sharpest screen.

Reviews.Title: Charger didn't work.....
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: The iPad came as advertised but the charger that was included wouldn't charge it. I spent $20 on a new one and it works fine. The back and edges of the iPad showed some use, nothing a protective case wouldn't hide. The screen was in perfect condition, it looked brand new.

Reviews.Title: VERY VERY NICE

Reviews.Content: THE BUYER IS ON TIME AND THE PRODUCT IS EXACTLY WHAT THEY SAT LIKE BRAND NEW STILL NO PROBS AND MY 6YR OLD LOVES IT HAVNT PUT IT DOWN YET......

Reviews.Title: Terrific.

Reviews.Content: On time, perfect condition, and the product is great. Xmas gift for a family member. Everyone should get one. Apple has done well.

Reviews.Title: ipad

Reviews.Content: This ipad shipped in time for Christmas just as described. It looked great and worked great. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. I was very impressed with the sale as a whole.

Reviews.Content: Excellent. The IPAD2 was an excellent gift (for Christmas) especially with its camera ability and other capabilities. It has major advantages over the IPAD 1.

Reviews.Content: The iPad was just as described--"like new". I couldn't tell that it had been previously used. I was very pleased with the tablet and the extras that came with it. I presented it as a Christmas present and needless to say, the recipient was very grateful and appreciative.

Reviews.Title: iPad is excellent in many ways.

Reviews.Content: I marked I Love It because it is great for what I bought it.  I has a learning curve for the new user.  I bought it for traveling and it has been what I expected.  So much easier to handle than my Macbook Pro.

Reviews.Title: Very Fine tool
Reviews.Author: J. Stanton
Reviews.Content: I am a yoga teacher. I use this to capture new student contact info, keep attendance records, refer to pose cheat sheet, and play music during meditation. I also read a lot on it. I love having an extensive library at my fingertips. An incredible number of classics are free on iBooks, Kindle and Gutenberg.org as are lesser known works by the authors of those classics. The camera is not so hot, but I have a good camera. This one will do in a pinch. The other capabilities more than make up for the camera's deficiencies. The Facebook app makes viewing all the photos that go by on Facebook a wonderful experience. National Geographic is gorgeous on this thing.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: lisa Lou
Reviews.Content: This is our first iPad. Been wanting one for years now. Everything is great about it except the picture quality. May be iI just haven't figured out how to perfect it yet.

Reviews.Title: like new

Reviews.Content: hell this thing was as good as a new 1 for less $$$ great value son loves it fantastic gift

Reviews.Title: I pad great

Reviews.Content: I use it all the time.  It's great for checking e-mail & watching movies.  Playing games are a plus also.

Reviews.Title: GREAT

Reviews.Content: This product is perfect.  It is exactly as described.  It works and looks as new.  I came in original packaging.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: keeeem
Reviews.Content: In the words of my boyfriend, "that iPad was a great investment, you use it all the time!" And I do use it all the time, it has made my workflow a lot more enjoyable and makes things easier to view, more enjoyable to process and ties in my interests with the apps and everything. The seller who I got this from gave me a great deal and he shipped it promptly and kept up with messages to give me info about it. It came brand new sealed in its box and I have been jubilant ever since I carried the box from the post office to my house. I take it with me everywhere and I use it for a lot of different things such as checking my email, pinterest, stumble upon, writing on blogsy and pages, as well as drawing and creating custom cards on procreate (a beautiful art app) and a bunch of other apps that work with me. I do my couponing on this iPad and I just absolutely love it. I have an android wifi only device and I wanted to work with the iOS system in order to see it for myself, and I love both, for my uses, each platform resonates perfectly for me for what I use it. I am also a budding app developer and I like working both platforms. (: I love my iPad 2!

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice

Reviews.Content: Fast, efficient & convenient-the best gift you could ever give yourself or someone else. It operates as if it is brand new and not refurbished

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: After I got this for my 5 year old, I realized what the big fuss was for Ipad. Great quick processer.. very good resolution ..many great apps (lot of apps for children kindergarden apps etc download).  Reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: My iPad is so fun! I'm still discovering all it can do. It doesn't have much memory but I'm ok with that.

Reviews.Title: My son loves his tablet

Reviews.Content: My son wanted an affordable iPad and we chose this one after shopping around.  We wanted more memory and wifi, and this was the right combination.  He loves it.

Reviews.Title: We love it....

We bought the one without the phone in it to keep the cost down... but we haven't had any trouble finding plenty of wi-fi hotspots where we could use it.  We can skype or facetime with our family also... really liking it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Good used quality

The screen had no scratches, blemishes and you honestly could not differentiate this from one right out of the store. Very happy with my purchase. This is the second iPad 2 that I have purchased used and it is honestly worth it to do so because the savings is phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift for Christmas
Reviews.Author: dmoney347
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my wife for Christmas last year. She loves Apple like I do so I bought her one.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipper
