Reviews.Title: typical apple quality
Reviews.Author: Jan Jurnecka
Reviews.Content: My (95 year old) Dad is very happy with this high quality device, which we gave him as a birthday present. He particularly loves the built-in camera.

Reviews.Title: I use this instead of my laptop
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad2 for my wife, since I was so pleased with the one I bought for myself last year. I use mine more than my laptop, installing Docs-To-Go for laptop-like capability for Excel, Word, and PPT.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Bex
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our purchase. We had one very happy boy on Christmas!! We couldn't be happier! Thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Envy
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product for everyone. The controls are simple enough for even my parents to understand (lol, I love them, but they're a little slow on the technological uptake), but the functions it provides and the apps that can be added are able to provide complex operations tailored to suit any need.The battery life is amazing. I can use it almost continuously for approximately twenty hours before I need to reuse it. Less if I'm using heavy graphics, etc. But even then it functions for around sixteen hours. It charges very quickly when turned off and plugged into the wall. The screen is very responsive, and the keyboard is not as difficult to use as I had feared (this is referring to the larger keyboard that appears when you turn the device side-ways. The smaller keyboard is more difficult, but not impossible). The only downside I see to the keyboard is that I can't select Spanish letters and accents. I hear that there may be a way to get them, but I haven't had success thus far.All in all, a wonderful device. I love it, and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 64GB
Reviews.Author: Michele Carter
Reviews.Content: The iPad overall is very nice. It runs smoothly and having the extra storage space is great. The only negative thing I have to say is that the screen is not the best compared to the retina display on the newer iPads and iPhones, but that is perfectly fine because of the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: Stephen Streett
Reviews.Content: Much faster than I expected and easy to use. My daughter thinks it the best  present she has ever received!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Rdy2226
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as raffle gift for an office party. The lucky winner has reported that she loves it. Great price and quick delivery!

Reviews.Title: Apple is the Best
Reviews.Author: Ronald Goldstein
Reviews.Content: Was never an Apple person but the IPad is amazing! Screen clarity is amazing as is speed. Arrived on time and can't be without it now. True convert.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: D. Silver
Reviews.Content: I sold my Windows tablet to get this one.  I did not want to invest in the latest one, so I got this iPad 2.  It is everything I expected.  Very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Persy
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly no damages at all is like a mini laptop a lot of memory good enough to keep me busy

Reviews.Title: I pad problem
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: It is great except the blue tooth does not work with portable printers such as HP office jet 100 & or canon pixma I 100 therefore I may have wasted my money I needed to be able to print on the road .

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Great product as always. I recommend this product to anyone who wishes to carry something smaller than a laptop. The iPad has everything I can think of that a  laptop or computer has.

Reviews.Title: good table
Reviews.Author: CCHS
Reviews.Content: We purchased this table to host square up only, so it is more than we need.  Would purchas e again.

Reviews.Title: Simply amazing
Reviews.Author: Mark Cheshire
Reviews.Content: I was always a skeptic of the iPad but I am so pleased that I finally relented to buy my first Apple product.  It is a complete new computing experience and I love it.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2 Review
Reviews.Author: Phyllis A Swink
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use it from tutorials online, but it's a great product convenient to take along, whereever.

Reviews.Title: Great, I love the ipad2
Reviews.Author: HorrorFan66 "Greer"
Reviews.Content: I received my I pad about 3 to 4 months ago. I did not get this item from amazon, I am in high school and my school issued out iPads to 11th and 12th graders. It's a wonderful device, nice browser and it has a very responsive touch screen, not one scratch is on the screen. It has almost a glass feel to the screen, very good quality. It's light, the speaker has good sound. I have heard people complain about the camera quality, honestly I love the camera and I think it's great. I know its not the best quality but I thinks it's fine.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Flor
Reviews.Content: THE BEST SHOOPING OF MY OF MY  LIFE AND IT HAD A VCERY GOOD PRICE AND IT WAS SHIPPED ON TIME

Reviews.Title: Its alright...
Reviews.Author: Huynh
Reviews.Content: This thing came with a charger, but it didn't charge !!!Everything else works doh, like new..I would recommend buying from apple because 1 year warranty is really sweet...

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: German Andres Eslava Vanegad
Reviews.Content: What else can you saiy about this ipad,  it is perfect, you can use it for everything you want, perfect

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: WCA
Reviews.Content: Ipad...great invention!  Buy one.  Bought it for my wife, loves using it to read books, Facebook, or surf the web.

Reviews.Title: Worth It
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle Fire that I enjoy very much so resisted getting an iPad and spending so much money.  After I got it I wondered why I waited so long.

Reviews.Title: Buen producto
Reviews.Author: jose romero
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto estado como se describe por el vendedor muy buena para navegar y ver vídeos y escuchar música lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: kedavis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item as a gift for my husband and he just loves it. My advice to anyone considering purchasing an iPad would be to review the data charges with their wireless provider before making a decision on which device to purchase since data plans can vary greatly.  Personally, I think the option of wireless/3G is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my father in law and it is exactly as the seller described. He loves it and bought the perfect case for it.

Reviews.Title: the best!!
Reviews.Author: V. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I just  love my ipad2 the only problems i found was it doesn't have an agreement with adobe flash so some videos would not play but I bought the iswifter browser in the app store for $5 and now i can view any video I want.  then to upload pics they have to either be taken with the ipad or use itunes so I bought a memory card adapter that fit on here for only $2.78 on ebay and now I can upload my pics no problem. also it was interactive with Twitter only and not Facebook bit with updating to the ios6 that corrected that. love the app store. my husband has a kindle fire so i can tell you this is much nicer than that and the app store is way better. i also bought the smart cover as it puts it to sleep while not using. the battery really does last 10 hours, it has never ran down on me and i use it every day

Reviews.Title: The best product
Reviews.Author: Tycho
Reviews.Content: The Ipad 2 is fast and easy to use. Don't know anything about electronics? You don't need to. Everything is self-explanatory with little to effort to get connected to the internet. Works great in conjunction with the Apple-TV!

Reviews.Title: Life saver
Reviews.Author: Charles Abernathy
Reviews.Content: This iPad has been a life saver as a student at West Virginia University it has allowed me to have all my textbooks with me at all times so I can do problems at anytime I want.  It also saves my back from carrying a laptop everyday.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: MoonPie
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this iPad to anyone. I love it !! It is just exactly what I was looking for !

Reviews.Title: Bigger ipod
Reviews.Author: bhattap
Reviews.Content: The bigger form of iPod, not seriously that useful... All these things are on iPhone too.. Over all design is good... The icons are too far at the screen..

Reviews.Title: kerri w
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: My Apple Ipad 2 arrived on time. I love my ipad it is very fast and efficient. It is very fibrate. The face-time and skype are awesome. Would'nt buy anything else. This is all I need. Thanks alot.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jax
Reviews.Content: The price was incredible for the awesome infamous iPad everyone raves about. I love it, my family and I can't get enough!

Reviews.Title: IPad
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I received my IPad from Amazon and I am very pleased it was already set up with instructions to sign in for my IPad.  I have had hours of enjoyment with it and I have a greatgrandson who plays for hours with the free games for him to play with.  I would suggest anyone who wants an IPad to buy it from Amazon the price was right!!!Apple iPad 2 MC769LL/A Tablet (16GB, WiFi, Black) 2nd Generation

Reviews.Title: iPad,I love
Reviews.Author: kinsale
Reviews.Content: Received the ipad2 last week and am quite happy with it. I am a bit agressive and it takes some time to get use to the sensitivity of the machine. I am pleased.Liz

Reviews.Title: Love my new IPad!
Reviews.Author: peejays
Reviews.Content: I have a desktop computer and I hardly use it now. I love my new IPad and it's wonderful to have when we're down in Florida.

Reviews.Title: iPad love it
Reviews.Author: Robyn
Reviews.Content: Awesome! Light weight, so easy to use & responds to WiFi right away- anywhere. I didn't  get the version 3 because it's heavier & I only use the camera on my iPhone. I highly recommend this product. Can someone recommend a good, protective case?

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Philip Coulson
Reviews.Content: What can you say that has not already been said.  In a word EXCELLENT!  The product does Apple proud and gives the consumer a near perfect product.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: everything was a described. came charged, works like a charm will be other electronics from this company when the need arises

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: afa
Reviews.Content: I got this product for my high school best friend. She liked it very much. It's beautiful and very convenient to use

Reviews.Title: Just as promised
Reviews.Author: 777 builder
Reviews.Content: Received promptly, works great. I have had for this for  over a month with no problems. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: IPad 2 wifi and verizon
Reviews.Author: Trudie Case "fabric lover"
Reviews.Content: After talking with Apple I was able to get my IPad up and running.  It is a wonderful product, as described and arrived early!  Best price I found.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: MY new iPad
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The iPad came in good shape, scratches on back as mentioned. But it was never mentioned that there was a scratch on the front screen. Its not too noticeable but I should have paid less considering that because others were the same price without this problem.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: nc
Reviews.Content: Received in a timely manner, package contained everything as expected and it is a GREAT tablet!! My entire family uses it for games, finances, reading and educational tools. If you have the money, I would certainly suggest you purchase an IPAD

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ivory
Reviews.Content: The shippment is quick.The ipad is cool. And I am hunting for some interesting app to install.  Wish there is more free app there.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: It works just great.  I use it all the time.  I  was asked to review the product.  It would have been hard to do with iPhone

Reviews.Title: A Fun and Convenient Tablet
Reviews.Author: The Life & Times of a Book Addict
Reviews.Content: At first, I thought the idea of having an iPad was silly, until my friend was telling me of the benefits of having one. I debated and after some time I got the iPad 2. Now I love it. I take it with me everywhere I go. To school, work, etc.. I use it to write, watch movies, check email, music, and the occasional games. The main thing I use it for is to read e-books. I like that I can have a Kindle app, a Kobo app, and a Nook app all in one place without having to have several different e-readers. I like to get certain books on certain apps, especially if the price for a book is more affordable than another. Having an iPad just makes things a little more convenient. I love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: baltierm
Reviews.Content: I love love Love my new iPad. I bought it mostly for work, but I am on it all the time time.

Reviews.Title: Works Good as per my expectation
Reviews.Author: AmazonShopper
Reviews.Content: this iPad 2 came almost like new, works good. Solves my purpose. performance of ipad 2 is excellent for a normal user, until unless u are using it for High end games or memory sucking apps.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my ipad very much.  I have no complaints about it and love being able to place on my kitchen counter and follow recepies.  It is very handy being able to carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Mr. Floyd M. Heafner
Reviews.Content: Being new to the MAC world, learning the IPad operation has been a challenge but one worth undertaking. So far I am very impressed with this unit and still learning it's capabilities. I tried another tablet last year and the connection speeds and operation was so frustrating that I returned it immediately. The Ipad 2 is very efficient even though I have to go to several different places to learn it's operation i,e, Itunes then ICloud, next Ibooks and Safari and much more to come I am sure.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: xWolf
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this for my dad and its awesome! I can bring it anywhere and its small enough for my backpack. Small and Convinient. I recommend you get this!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely great!
Reviews.Author: Tristin
Reviews.Content: I couldn't have gotten a better deal. My iPad worked just like new without any marks or scratches. It was sent really quickly and I got it way before anticipated. This was a great purchase and I would do it again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: A revolutionary device but not a laptop replacement
Reviews.Author: rkruger
Reviews.Content: Destroyed my laptop in a usual manner - drop from the counter.  Bought an iPad 2 and tried to use it as a laptop replacement.  I did last several months and didn't really feel that my range was somehow limited.  Eventually I purchased a laptop to use on a long trip.  It was a huge relief to go back to a bigger screen, fixed keyboard, windowed environment, and faster processing speeds.iPad is a revolutionary device and I find its design and build quality outstanding.  However, once the novelty wears off, it becomes apparent that it is best at supplementing your other mobile devices, not completely replacing them.The device is also fragile, so make sure to buy a sturdy case, especially if you plan to use your device in the field.

Reviews.Title: This Product is Amazing.
Reviews.Author: Samuel A. Yochmowitz "sombradeti"
Reviews.Content: This product is Amazing and I would recommend it to any level computer or tablet user. It runs fast and has basic functionality, and if you can't do what you want to do with it out of the box you can easily find software to add the feature.Pros:Camera on Both SidesSimple and effective User InterfaceBuilt in SpeakerRuns pretty fastOn Amazon you can find the 16,32, and 64 Gig editions of this second generation tabletCons:The Pricing on Amazon is not the cheapest you can find for the 16 Gig edition. You can go to an Apple store (base price $399 for the 16 Gig ) and get it cheaper than through Amazon's including Tax.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: DMoney
Reviews.Content: Product arrived in perfect condition, looked brand new and working as brand new despite knowing it was a refurbished product. Easy to set up the data plan just need to have access to wireless connection or a computer with iTunes in order to set up the iPad initially.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with product
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, IPAD works great.  Should have bought it a year ago.  Love it. Did not need much time to get use to an Apple product.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Mummy of 1
Reviews.Content: I purchased this "used like new" from Amazon Warehouse and was pleasantly surprised to receive an item that looked brand new.  It easily found my Wi Fi and I was able to set up my email accounts.  It is a little heavy for reading, but I mostly use my Kindle Fire for that.  The iPad quickly connects to the Internet and I find myself picking it up instead of my laptop when I need to check something on the net.  It is my go to device for casual browsing and viewing my recipes.  Love it more than I thought I would.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Having fun
Reviews.Content: The Apple iPad 2 was given to me as a birthday present and I have not been able to put it down.  All of my friends are sharing apps and from the games to news it is the greatest?  There is still so much to discover.  I love it and would recommend It to anyone.  You must be able to pick up WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: I am soon happy with my wonderful new iPad! Love that it came with a screen protector because the same day I received it my daughter scratched up my screen and I peel the protector off to check and make sure it was good and thank god it was!! I give my product and shipping time  10 stars.lol

Reviews.Title: Great iPurchase
Reviews.Author: M. Lavallee
Reviews.Content: The two iPads ordered arrived in perfect condition. The purchased items were clearly identified as AT&T; during the order process, but I required the Verizon provider. Items were given an RMA and return label within 30 seconds of my call. This is the best customer service I've ever dealt with.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Tom at 3R
Reviews.Content: Although this was a rebuilt unit, it worked perfectly, showed no signs of wear and was easy to set-up.The iPad has met my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: stmccraw
Reviews.Content: I had been bidding on this item via Ebay with no success, as people were paying more than $430 for a "used" iPad 2.  Knowing they were only $399 plus tax, I made the decision to purchase a new iPad2 from Amonzon.  The item shipped fast and has been all that I expected.

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet for work and play
Reviews.Author: Dsk001
Reviews.Content: This is a very good item to have cause it can be used for work and play. I have played a TON of games on this but I have also done a lot of school and job related work on this device. For basic users this can completely replace a laptop altogether. There are so many apps there must be something that exist for your needs.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied.
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: exceeded my expectations. item arrived faster than i expected, right ontime for my trip. normally i dont write reviews but this was truly note-worthy.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Chris (new_resource on Twitter)
Reviews.Content: I got it in 3 days, super fast. It's clean and awesome. My family thought it was brand new. So far as I learn to use it and load up the apps I'm loving it. If I wanted to nit-pick and this is nit-picky, I didn't like the bubble envelope it was packaged in, but that's about it. Everything else is cool.Thanks Amazon and thanks Encore Equipment!

Reviews.Title: Mostly amazing
Reviews.Author: Revan
Reviews.Content: My iPad 2 has worked great for me, and even though I originally expected that I would need more space, the 16 GBs have been plenty. However, this is my first tablet, and one thing I've noticed is that it's hard to do much besides watch movies, play games, and check email on them without some sort of a keyboard. The on-screen keyboard is just too clunky and hard to use to be very productive on. If this was easier to use, I'd give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: CL.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my iPad, never knew I would use it so much.  At first  had second thoughts about buying a used one but so far I love it and was taking care of .  I have jet to get a bill for it and don't understand that, no one at Amonazon seems to br able to help me with that.  Thanks for a good product.

Reviews.Title: Quality is there
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Most of the reviewers have given all the pros and cons, so I won't bore you with another list here. Like most people, I use the iPad 90% of the time on just a few Apps. For me, reading an ebook, checking stock quotes, and reading the news constitute most of what I do. It's good to have half a million Apps, but it's impossible to use that many, or even a fraction of that. I've compared the iPad to the Kindle for reading ebooks. For me, the iPad is the clear winner. In my opinion, the iPad is easier to read and is sharper, also the color is a plus. The Kindle is hard to read in low light. Maybe if you are outside, the Kindle would have the edge, but I never read outside, and I think most people don't (possibly some do at the beach). I have an iPad 1 with WiFi and 3G, and an iPad 2 with WiFi only. I think the WiFi is the way to go because of the cost savings. Sometimes the 3G is nice, but I don't use it that often. Bottom line, I can recommend either model. It's reliable, easy to use, and Apple has the updates to improve things or fix any bugs that crop up.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 Review
Reviews.Author: Gpvegas
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is a very good product. I bought it when it came out from Apple. Mine was stolen a year later and I bought this one from Amazon. It is exactly as advertised and is working in perfect condition. I saved about $150. I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: iPad Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Larry Melton
Reviews.Content: I needed a larger memory on my iPad 2. Since they are only available in 16GB from apple, I was having a hard time finding a new one with 64GB, even online. Amazon had a vendor who was able to sell me the higher memory iPad at a reasonable price, and it was shipped promptly. I am very satisfied with this purchase from all points of service.

Reviews.Title: getting it new
Reviews.Author: J. Hayes "Videographer & Photographer"
Reviews.Content: my dad has an ipad i always play it and i refuse to say its less than awesome so now im getting my own

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: David Bowlin
Reviews.Content: Very quick and very sturdy feeling. The battery seems to last all day too. And tons of apps to use and play with.

Reviews.Title: Great good looking tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Juan Reinaldo Morales Gil
Reviews.Content: This is an incredible and a great good looking tablet, almost a laptop because you can all you want with it, i recommend it and i will buy again from this seller

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Jenn Stacy
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting along time to get myself one of these.  I guess the waiting paid off because I finally got it. You can do some much with an Ipad, it's endless. It's amazing just like Amazon is.  I order from here alot, and I will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Great tablet plenty of gigabyte space.  Easily handable.  I would reccommend this product to everyone I knew because it is like a pc and does everything the same as a pc, but at a cheaper price...

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: T. Noble
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an iPad2 and I have to say I LOVE it! I tried to buy one from the Apple site but they no longer offer the 64 GB model. The seller shipped quickly and everything was as listed. There is so much to learn and so much one can do with this product. I am looking forward to using it!

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad as a graduation gift for my granddaughter. So far I am very pleased with it. It arrived on time and in great condition. It is being used more than I had imagined it would be! She has had absolutely no problems at all. She will be starting college and probably get great use out of it.

Reviews.Title: I love them iPad
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great and functions perfectly. I opted to get the 2nd generation with 3G and 64 gb  unit and have I activated the 3G which works good. After a little confusion regarding the shipping timeline, the seller upgraded the services to meet the expectations at no additional cost. One thing to keep in mind though is that the delivery requires a signature at delivery so for a residential delivery may get delayed if no one is home.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: Circuschica
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical to order from a new merchant with no ratings but I'm very happy I did.  I got an iPad at a great price and thought it was to good to be true but it was true.  I expected it to arrive next week but I got in 4 days sooner and was pleasantly surprise and very happy.  I will definitely buy from her again confident I'll get the same super fast deliver and quick response.

Reviews.Title: Should you purchase the iPad 2?
Reviews.Author: Neel

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_mo2WYLIOT0FEO37/187-6008414-4704345?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2WYLIOT0FEO37currentClick) { return cv_mo2WYLIOT0FEO37currentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:42 MinsThe iPad 2 was a great device. Nevertheless, the release of the New iPad brings forth a new question: Should you buy the now cheaper iPad 2?There are many factors to be considered when making this purchase. The main upgrades of the New iPad include retina display, faster processor, better cameras, and with iOS 6, siri. My family owns both the iPad 2 and the New iPad. Apple did not change the iPad much between these two generations. It kept the same battery life, the same thickness (almost), and the same design. Thus, it is a personal decision.The devices are very similar, and most of the cons of the iPad 2 are fixed in the New iPad. However, is the upgrade worth $100-150?Cons of iPad 2 and how the New iPad uses them:Lack of Retina Display: When the iPad 2 was released, retina display had already been seen in other apple devices, like the iPod touch 4th generation. The general public was disappointed by the lack of this feature in the iPad 2. The iPad 3 had this feature. However, I don't really notice the difference. They both appear to have excellent displays. The New iPad's improved display can only be identified in rare conditions, such as viewing upgraded apps or sharp photos. Overall, the retina display in the iPad increases the memory many apps in the app store take up. For example, many iPad 2 users posted bad reviews about Monopoly HD when they had an update that increased the memory that app took up extensively. The update of Monopoly HD did not bring any new features besides Retina display. iPad 2 users were angry because now they lost memory without any benefits.Lack of better Cameras: The iPad 2's cameras are terrible. They back facing camera is .7 megapixels. On a smaller screen this would be acceptable because it is still HD, but on a 10 in. screen photos shot by the iPad camera look pixelated. The New iPad is said to have 5 megapixel cameras. Even so, the cameras on the New iPad aren't that great. Look at the video I posted so you can see the difference yourself. The video is best viewed in full screen.Faster Processor: The iPad 2 has a decent processor and is capable of doing everything you can currently do on an iPad decently. The iPad 3 is faster, especially when loading apps. The upgrade is great but not necessary.Siri: With iOS 6, the New iPad will have exclusive new abilities like Siri. Although many are not appreciative of siri after seeing it on the iPhone, the fact that the New iPad will now have it suggests that apple will continue to do this. Apple's newest products will continue to receive features that older products won't have through updates. Thus, it may be a good idea to purchase the New iPad as another one is not expected soon.

Reviews.Title: iPad is like no other tablet on the market!
Reviews.Author: Granna
Reviews.Content: Apple's reputation for quality is unsurpassed in thier tablet.  Very intuitive and easy to use.  I was able to touch type on the screen without putting on my reading glasses ..... a real plus for anyone who did not grow up in the texting age and like most of us over 50 need reading glasses.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: SammyMorales
Reviews.Content: It was an used item but looked just like new, was delibered in time, and is working perfectly fine for me.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: keti
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tablet.I like it and I am happy with it. It fits all m requirements and is exactly what i was expecting.thank you

Reviews.Title: iPad is like no other tablet on the market!

Reviews.Author: keti
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tablet.I like it and I am happy with it. It fits all m requirements and is exactly what i was expecting.thank you

Reviews.Title: I-Pad 2
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: Not a scratch on it. It works perfect. The box also looked new, and everything was in the box instruction and all literature that comes with a new I-Pad.What a great vendor. Thanks for the great deal ! I will buy from this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The iPad runs great! I had been wanting one for a while and it was great to find one at such a good price that runs like it is brand new. I am actually writing this very review on it now. It works marvelously and am glad that I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love My ipad
Reviews.Author: Lynda
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad 2.  This is my first ipad and it goes everywhere with me.  I wouldn't be without it.  Plan on buying one for my husband for Christmas this year.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't live without it
Reviews.Author: Cass
Reviews.Content: You can't buy a 64 gig IPad2 in stores anymore. Amazon had it for a good $100 less. The 2 doesn't have as good camera resolution as three, but that's what I use my IPhone for. And with Cloud all of the pics come to my IPad, then I do all of my photo editing. It has virtually replaced my laptop!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY IPAD!
Reviews.Author: Majo
Reviews.Content: I love my IPAD, truly the world is closer now, I use and share it with my 6 year old daughter!!! She loves it too!! best of the best, this is my first Apple item and I can't believe os always on!! you don't have to wait untill anything boots! love it love it love it!

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I never  realized what I was missing by using a pc instead of a Mac product all these years. This thing is amazing! It is so easy to understand and use I can't believe it. The picture, sound and options are still blowing my mind and it's been a month. Takes a while to charge but that's no big deal. Everyone has to sleep. With the amazon prime option I got it the next day. Very happy!

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: Barb Y "Barb Y"
Reviews.Content: I love my new ipad.  Had a little trouble setting it up and ended up going to a local apple store, but they couldn't help too.  I finally got it working after a few days,  I won't leave home with out it.

Reviews.Title: Love My ipad
Reviews.Author: Lynda
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad 2.  This is my first ipad and it goes everywhere with me.  I wouldn't be without it.  Plan on buying one for my husband for Christmas this year.

Reviews.Title: IPad New User
Reviews.Author: Al-Ananda-Ji
Reviews.Content: The iPad we ordered arrived promptly and in good order.  It set up quickly and in no time we were online and learning a new way to surf. We are entirely happy with the product and the ordering process.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Riley
Reviews.Content: Love it. It's perfect and in perfect condition. It got here really quickly too! Got it for my cousin's grad gift, she loved it. Thank you ever so much.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Dtepedino
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, its my first apple Thing and it works wonderfull. I am very excited. Very user friendly

Reviews.Title: Absolutely loving it!
Reviews.Author: Fancy
Reviews.Content: I just got my iPad and I am absolutely loving it!  I had a hard time putting it down to go to be last night.  I got it from Jupiter Mall and am so pleased with their customer service.  Shipped from NJ to WI in 3 days!  I will definately order from them again and again.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product and operation
Reviews.Author: Clari
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING  was excellent, the ipad and the a amazon experience!!! Im happy with my Ipad III recomend 100% this apple tablet, ideal for work, travel and watch movies everywhere.

Reviews.Title: A Guide For The Average Person
Reviews.Author: esther
Reviews.Content: I love my Ipad but have found it to be very challenging.  A simple "how to" book included in the sale would have made me feel secure as I proceeded to look at the apps and their applications.  I have sent out cries for "help" to Amazon and have received great help from the telephone experts.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: it's me
Reviews.Content: I've had the i pad 2 since December 2011 and am still learning how to use it and how much fun it is.  I will admit it is a little too expensive, but I am enjoying myself while learning how to use it.  My seller was teriffic!

Reviews.Title: Prompt delivery, item was as advertised
Reviews.Author: W.
Reviews.Content: The iPad was received in good condition, but in Japanese, which I am not fluent.  After reconfiguring the device and talking with Apple I was able to get it to work well.  The seller performed just as advertised and it was received before the delivery date.  As far as I can tell it will perform well and nothing can go wrong, go wrong, go wrong, go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Nice toy for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My six year old is addicted to it.  I don't know whether that's good or bad.  Most of the time she watches netflix but other times she reads childrens books and plays casual games.  I hardly use it other than while I lie down on my bed (with laptop, you can't do that facing up).  It was a gift from her grandmom.  If I had to buy a tablet for her, I wouldn't buy ipad because other android tablets do them fine with lesser price.  She hardly plays her Nintendo DS anymore.  Maybe Nintendo should make a tablet.  It's fast and has no lag, rarely has problems (one time I had to do factory restore because it wouldn't download/update apps anymore, very strange).  I hope it last 10 years.  I know apple wouldn't do it for minimalist reasons but I wished they would include usb ports, microsd slot, and HDMI.  These and being able to view Flash are the reasons why I'd opt for Toshiba Thrive if I had to buy a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Loved ordering my iPad at amazon!
Reviews.Author: anniebell331
Reviews.Content: Great product!  No regrets, easy to use. I use mine all day long. My great granddaughter is 3 and she plays games all the time. Plenty of free apps for her to be satisfied. Love my iPad!,,,

Reviews.Title: tct2
Reviews.Author: tct2 "tct2"
Reviews.Content: I had an IPod 4G and it was amazing. I have never owned an Apple product before, I was so impressed with the touch that I sold it to upgrade to the Ipad2 could not be more happy with my decision. I use this device for browsing the web and playing appa which are amazing and second to none as far as quality and selection. I got this device at a killer price from amazon. The only remorse I have is that Apple will have a better device in a matter of months, but that is battle you will never win.

Reviews.Title: Awsome!!
Reviews.Author: Gamer
Reviews.Content: Well, let me start out by saying I am 14. I waste money a lot. Well, my brother got an iPad 2 for his birthday and I loved his. So, I went to Amazon and Bought it from this seller. Needless to say, I am VERY satisfied. Shipping was very very fast, it got here next day and I only paid for 2 day shipping! It is fun to play with and I vouch for this seller!

Reviews.Title: Didn't expect to but I do...
Reviews.Author: tlh604
Reviews.Content: I love this Ipad and wouldn't give it up for anything.  When shopping for a tablet I checked out everything from a - z but came back to the Ipad because it was the best.  Didn't want to spend so much on a tablet but glad I did. It is easy to travel with, the kids love it and so does my husband.  Love the apps, something for everyone.

Reviews.Title: its so cool
Reviews.Author: carolyn morel
Reviews.Content: I liked the Apple iPad 2  Tablet (16GB, Wifi,) NEWEST MODEL it was cool my friends all have it and they all use my apple id so i decided to get one too well im still waiting but it will be the coolest electronic ever!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Kd
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my iPad. At times I have a hard time putting it down. All the apps are great and there are many addictive games. Great for browsing the internet the only downfall I see is that the iPad is not Flash compatible which makes some websites hard to view. Other than that I got exactly what I expected.

Reviews.Title: IPad2
Reviews.Author: Shirl/nSC
Reviews.Content: The only thing I needed to do was upload the latest version, 5.01, which is free when you call 1-800-APLCARE for help to upload, if you need help.  It is such a great tool for my work in real estate, or any other occasion for that matter!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: SanFresco
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad as it is so easy to navigate and very handy to use anywhere around the house. It is lightweight and turns on fast. The OS is easy to use as well and also easy to navigate. I have an android phone so this is a nice change. The tablets use Android OS which I am not crazy about. This is the one to get.

Reviews.Title: A rather fun distraction and way to convince myself I'm not blocked at school
Reviews.Author: a gentle sound
Reviews.Content: This was an unexpected gift. In truth I'm buying Fires for my own kids (love them) and intended one day to get one myself. So when I was given the ipad it was a serious shock. That said I use it at my school where things are mostly blocked. It's so vivid and I can hold it up close and see it so well. The screen is vibrant.I prefer the Fire for my kids actually and wish I had a set of these to teach with. Too bad my school in a poverty area can't wrangle that.All I can say is the thought of not having this for kids seems luddite.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Brandon J. Hall "Rationalism & Logicality pro...
Reviews.Content: I wanted a lightweight tablet to replace my laptop for school use, and after weighing my options, I decided on the iPad 2 over the Samsung Galaxy tab because Apples appstore is alot more disverse and expansive. With apps like Documents To Go Premium and AVPlayerHD, it has almost completely replaced my laptop, and with the keyboard/case combo I ordered it does word processing just fine. It does pretty well with the battery life at mid-level brightness and does terrific on the lowest setting. Im a college student and Im at school for 12 hours on some days, so time is factor and it delievers.My one big issue with the iPad is its restrictions. You can not drag and drop items like word documents, images, pdf's, videos to and from the ipad without itunes, and because the iPad natively only plays a few video formats, you have to download an app if you want a broader selection. AVPlayerHD plays all video formats and actually allows you to drag these files into the sharing option in itunes. Which makes the device feel much more diverse, but the app isnt free, its about 1.99 in the appstore. Aside from the restriction issue I really like it, it hasnt completely replaced laptop, not until your able to transfer items without the use of iTunes.(There are apps like AVPlayerHD that allow you to transfer  certain incompatible files to your ipad through iTunes, and Im sure there are some for photos and documents, but you'll have to hunt for them down and they probably wont be free -but I guess if you can afford to shell out the dough for an iPad you can afford a couple 1 to 10 dollar apps-)I reccomend the iPad, its pretty cool.*Update*I got my iPad on Jan 14th, 2012 and got rid of it February 12th, 2012. It was very fun for awhile, but once the novelty wore off the iPad was just too limited. I needed more freedom and less hassle, I'm not a fan of going through iTunes for virtually all data transferring. I cant hook anything up to it without some ridiculous peripheral; something as simple as an SD or MicroSD card slot could have made a world of difference, my model was 16 gig. After the iOS 5 update it was down to about 13, and I had over 6 gigs for music and 8 for previous iPod touch apps.I had tons of movies but with the limited none expandable space, I could only fit about three compressed movies at a time, which were greatly smaller in size compared to anything offered in the iTunes store. I greatly regret not going with the Galaxy Tab, which in terms of flexibility is incredibly superior, however, neither of these are computers so the overall flexibility I prefer might never be on that level. That said, I probably should have gone with the Galaxy, although, the iPad was very fun, it wasn't for me.

Reviews.Title: Nice, easy to use, and a great invention
Reviews.Author: Patricia Brouillette
Reviews.Content: This is definitely worth the money. I don't have to be running to my computer. It is very portable, so unlike your desktop computer, you can take it to any room. Unless you are doing a lot on the actual road away from WiFi, there is not much reason to get one with 3G. Between IMessage and FaceTime it makes it worth it for my 5 1/2 year old daughter to keep in touch with Grammy and Grandpa, who live in a different state. She likes to talk to them while eating dinner, so I would rather have her eat near this than my computer.

Reviews.Title: excellent hardware and service
Reviews.Author: Caminante
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad for my wife. If you're not a Mac user, it might be a little difficult to get used to, at first, as it was for her. However, it's well worth the learning effort. After an initial slow, but fun orientation and adjustment period, she loves it. It's fun, attractive, and pretty funciontal. I found it was not good for doing my homework asssignments and heavy duty work, because of its small size and onscreen keyboard (not effecctive if you really know how to type). However, once we added a bluetooth keyboard, I thought that it really could be a good "only" computer for anyone but a hard core document writer. I certainly would consider it for myself, as a travel and meeting device, but I'm still not giving up the big comfortable screen on my desk in the office. One more important note. Customer service is superb to any I've used anywhere in my life. Representatives are friendly, responsive, well-educated and just good folks. Thanks, Mac.

Reviews.Title: A tablet-sized iPhone, sans phone
Reviews.Author: Dane Alexander "Dane"
Reviews.Content: Like most, I've been smitten by the iPad since it was released about two years ago. I couldn't justify purchasing it for the longest time because I couldn't figure out how to work it into my technology regime. It's not computer enough to replace my Macbook Pro, and it's not phone enough to replace my iPhone 4 (not the 4S) running 5.0.1. When you factor in the price, I just couldn't convince myself that the iPad was something I couldn't live without.Then the iPad 2 comes out: front- and rear-facing cameras were new, so I could use the iPad for face-timing my mom 14 hours away, but it was essentially still something halfway between a computer and an iPhone.Finally I came to a point where I could spare the $600+ dollars to purchase the cheapest iPad 2 capable of connecting to at&t;'s 3G wireless service. I ordered this iPad on January 18 and just received it yesterday, so keep in mind I've only had this thing for one day.Immediately, I can see how the iPad 2 may come off as seductive; essentially, it's a ginormous screen surrounded by a thin frame of black or white (depends on which color your purchase--I bought white) with a single button. There's no denying that it's sexy. When you turn it on (after plugging it into iTunes and completing the necessary setup) you're blown away by the crisp screen--though it's not yet on par with the Retina display of the iPhone 4 and 4S, it's a luscious screen and only the seasoned 'techie' would notice this slight inferiority. The iPad 2's screen is still better than most if not all its competition.Apple also has a leg-up on its competition with the easy integration with iTunes. If your like me and you bought the iPad 2 to simply be what it is: an iPad, somewhere in between a computer and an iPhone--then you likely won't be filling your iPad 2's limited storage with your entire music library. I opted to sync with only my recently played music, top played music, recently added music, and a few recent playlist I've made, which I'll probably replace with newer playlists as they're made. I did sync with a fair amount of the same apps that I have on my iPhone, a handful of movies, none of my ringtones (what would I use them for?) and ended up using about 9GB of the 16GB available on the iPad 2 model I purchased. And in all actuality, after the firmware files and other junk Apple puts on their products, only about 13-14GB of the 16 are available to use out of the box.As expected, web browsing and email are where the iPad 2 shines. It's very smooth, the screen shows side-screens and sub-menus simultaneously, which really makes this thing quick to use. I used a Best Buy gift card I received for Christmas to purchase Apple's aluminum wireless keyboard to connect to my iPad 2 via Bluetooth and, although the keyboard makes me occasionally reach over for a mouse (you must still use the touch-screen mechanism despite having an actual keyboard), typing is a DREAM on here now! Facebook is also very fun to use with the keyboard setup versus the onscreen keyboard or even using the Facebook app on my iPhone. Don't get me wrong, the onscreen keyboard of the iPad 2 is very usable, but I find with a screen as large as the iPad 2's, I'd prefer having an actual keyboard so as to utilize as much of the screen as possible for web browsing, emailing, Facebooking, and anything else.I wish Apple would make it more clear that for at&t; 3G models, the SIM card is not included and will need to be purchased separately. I haven't gotten around to going to my local at&t; store to pick one up, so I'm not too sure how much a SIM card will cost.All things considered, so far I'd say I'm happy that I purchased the iPad 2. It's only receiving 4 of the 5 stars because, although I'm very comfortable with using it and definitely see myself using it on a daily basis, it hasn't replaced any of my other electronics. In all actuality, it's become another separate electronic device that I've incorporated into my routine for its own purposes. The 4 of 5 stars also reflects the price; I understand that you 'get what you pay for' (which is definitely the case for the iPad 2, as it outperforms the competition on every aspect except price), but for a product to ADD to your routine rather than to REPLACE or SIMPLIFY, I think the price could come down just slightly. Even a difference of $50 might be enough to lure in some hesitant customers.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product
Reviews.Author: Phandaal
Reviews.Content: I ordered the IPAD2 3 days ago for my mother, 75 years old.She really enjoys it and like how user friendly it is. She spent hours on it already, listening to music and using the apps I installed for her.I would recommend the Ipad2 for everyone that is not really concerned about the limitations (no flash, limited customization, necessity to go through Itunes for everything...)Display is nice, sound quality is good and it is really easy to use for older people.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad 2
Reviews.Author: teachntec
Reviews.Content: The iPad arrived within the one day shipping by Amazon.  The packing was appropriate for this item.  I find the Apple line of consumer electronics to be very user friendly. The software is intuitive--it does and goes where you would expect it to if you were doing the same process manually. This is my first exposure to the iPad.  I highly recommend it as an addition, or replacement to other computer products.  The screen keyboard takes getting use to. It is a light touch.  I anticipated this, amd so I am using an AmazonBasics Bluetooth Keyboard for Apple iPad/iPhone. There was no contact with the seller as this was fulfilled by Amazon, but I would buy from this seller again based on a good product delivered in the described package. Buy an iPad, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 Review
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I can probably go into a dissertation about what i like with the iPad 2, but I'll just say that it is reliable, doesn't crash or perform updates everyday and does the basic tasks I need it for.  If you are debating on this or the Galaxy, it comes down to personal preference really.  If you are looking into a Kindle Fire, my daughter has one, and I can tell you there is a reason it costs $199 because it is not made as well, just the basics of using it are not as easy or efficient as the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Seller was a quick responder
Reviews.Author: kmstein
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 2 is great.  I would strongly suggest going with more space if you are going to download videos or applications.  The icloud only does music/photos.  I submitted inquiry to seller and quick response was followed addressing my questions.Thanks for the speedy response!

Reviews.Title: Consider a Macbook Air before you get too excited about the iPad2
Reviews.Author: Knight Rain "Liberty=Creativity"
Reviews.Content: After a few weeks of playing with and trying to make my iPad2 functional and integrate it into my life etc. it suddenly dawned on me that so much of what I was struggling to do ... was to make my iPad into a... notebook computer... that does the things that the Mac OS already does so well!One of the first things I did was ... BUY A Keyboard! Mac Bluetooth.Then it was the infatuation with "apps!" " GOLLY look at this! It allows me to print a document!!"  And other absurdities like that.You know? The stuff that we all have been doing well now for 10 plus years, with the buggy nightmares of the 90s, that used to make one pull hair out in Windows' frustration, now thankfully long suppressed... .I used to refer to Mac devotees as "Mac Bigots!"But after dealing with Windows security issues, and instability through every Windows generation... I finally took the plunge with a Powerbook and never looked back. If I became less than a "Mac Bigot," still I learned to love Apple's integration,  stability, sleek looks and creative tides... that happily washed over Apple's countrymen and America as a whole, like that great wave from the first iPhone.But, this is an iPad review and although I don't desire to denigrate this generally great piece of technology or even review it seriously, I  do want to you to seriously consider a Macbook Air before the iPad.Weight is a great part of the allure of the lightweight iPad...but... the new Macbook Air is only about twice as heavy and since it may be likely that the first thing you may buy is a Bluetooth keyboard... that may not be a deciding issue...because if you wish for your, oh so cool... purchase to actually be a functional input device of text... and you took touch-typing in high school... the plunking at an iPhone or iPad's screen... with one's THUMBS... or the dull end of your fingers... becomes a tedious devolution of functionality.And this is the real core of my criticism of PADS in general. They are at this point clever receivers of information but clunky input...ers. One looks for app after app to do the simplest things...  and then we say... "golly isn't that cool,  I can actually highlight text!"And guess what? That highlighting of text usually takes a few tries to get the text that you actually need to select with "TAPS" selected...to 'mark-up' a doc properly... and some compromise is usually entailed and could have been far more exactly... achieved with a mouse 30 seconds ago.Look ... do I like my iPad?Yes!And I did  order a stylus for 27 bucks and it has not come yet so I can't comment upon that helpful addition as a partial solution for... the iPad's entry flaws... .  But realize... when one peals away the COOL... and gets to the functional daily needs of email ... and entry of certain data... you will spend a good deal of your iPad time... which after all... is life time... learning to get around.. the touch screen and the operating system"s... limitations.Now ... it is true that if one has say...an iMac which I Highly recommend ... that the real question is: how much...do you actually  need to input at the coffee shop or as a quick reference in the car or as a very light travel basic communication computing device? If the answer is "not really that much..." or if putting up with the iPad's limitations for real text entry is OK on occasion... and the added weight of a keyboard is only needed part time... then it has indeed a LOT of very cool qualities and... apps too... that we actually do find we desired and... didn't even know it!!Are even... useful and yes... fun,  a LOT of fun.If you work seriously on the road... an iPad is not for you... at this time in its development... if you need a very cool slick device that is indeed just about the perfect weight and size for extreme portability happiness... and mainly want it for consumption, of information... then the iPad is wonderful.The iPad is a very creative and evolving technology. The "Cloud" Apple's and say Dropbox... are bringing all of these devices together and we all are literally with our use... defining their place and potential and the APP ecosystem is indeed VITAL... .That participation in change... is in itself fun to watch and to take part in... lets face it... our participation in that creative process by supporting what works is... a central part of an iPad's attractions... nothing wrong with that! That is the old America, remember her?Creativity  is sadly... so purposefully dimmed for political outcomes... in our dear country...that any tree of creative life left...is worth supporting even one without a real keyboard... .

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Gaurav
Reviews.Content: I took a long time deciding which tablet to buy and had narrowed down to Motorola Xoom, Sony Tablet S and iPad 2. I tried out all 3 and a few more tablets before choosing the iPad 2. I bought the iPad because-1. Navigation was smooth with the iPad. With all other tablets, I noticed that the tablet would not react to the touch every once in a while.2. The tablet is for my wife. iOS is much more intuitive than Android when it comes to tablets. the complexity of use of Android is fine for techies, though.3. Assurance of OS upgrade. I know that my iPad 2 would be compatible with future versions of iOS and that Apple would allow free upgrades. At the time of my purchase, I wasn't so sure about Android based tablets (looking at how many Android based cellphones dont get timely OS upgrades)4. Flaws in other tablets. Every other tablet has flaws, which is pretty disappointing. Xoom is good, but they dont deliver what they promise (Read up on Xoom users' agony over the micro SD unusability for over 6 months). Sony tablet doesn't come with 3G.Reasons why I took so long before buying the iPad:1. Dependence on iTunes2. No SD input3. Heavy price of accessories (like the one for connecting iPad to a TV)But in the end, it was worth it. Now I rarely open my PC; I just find it too bulky and slow now. :)

Reviews.Title: Loads of Fun
Reviews.Author: A. J. Herring "Daemon"
Reviews.Content: I won't hash out the technical specs and details like other reviewers have probably done a few times before me.I love my iPad 2. My girlfriend just got me one for our anniversary. Funny thing is she just got one from her mom for Christmas at my suggestion. So now we both have one.She just recently got wifi at work, too. She takes hers to work. She tends to call me about 3-4 times a day (at least it feels like that) and now she can call me on her iPad using Facetime, so she can see me as well. I don't really know how I feel about that feature sometimes, but it's pretty cool. I have other friends with iPads and iPhones and stuff, so we can all Facetime just like a house phone. It takes a little more effort to use it (just like Skype), but it's a really cool native app to the iPad. The camera quality is a bit to be desired. I think my Mac has a better camera than the iPad.Anyway, I'm not giving a review of Facetime. The iPad 2 is fast. The screen is pretty large compared to my iPod touch and my Droid X. It works well as a reader. The games work well on it. I've even used it as a drawing tablet a few times. I would link a photo I've drawn in my review, but I'm not sure I can do that.The browser works just as well as it does on my Mac and my iPod touch. It's not the best thing in the world, but it works well.Mail is still a problem for me. I can't get my Yahoo to work and I can't actually divulge why. I know the reason why and I'm not willing to fix it because it could be a slight security risk. Gmail works fine for me. I can't get my work e-mail to work either, but I haven't messed with it enough to really determine the reason just yet.The iPads are great to have around to watch Netflix and things like that. Especially when there is a toddler that wants to watch something and everyone else is watching something on the big screen.Finally, the iPads are very expensive. So far my experience with Apple in the past few years is that they build a quality product and it tends to be worth it. I hope they continue this trend. I can't say whether or not it was worth the cost as I didn't shell out the money this time. I can only say that I'm enjoying the product and I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, love mine

Reviews.Content: Really love mine, easy to use and great apps, this is my first apple product. Was scared I would not like it. But overall not bad

Holding the iPad for the first time is a great feeling, and the whole structure of this amazing product. It is truly the best tablet. Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Title: The IPAD 2 is a work of art!!!
Reviews.Author: johnnyb
Reviews.Content: OK. Here it is. The IPAD 2 that came to the house via UPS was in a little box. Who knew that something so powerful would come in a non-descript brown box. I was tracking the travels and travails of my IPAD through the supplied tracker (I am grateful for this feature) and was literally waiting for the UPS guy to show, times are either 10:00AM or 3:00PM missed the ten AM. Guess what..... Was waiting at the front door at 3; UPS showed up and so did my IPAD. Opened the box up, stiffened my resolve to not mess around until the IPAD was fully charged. So hooked the IPAD up, and waited for a full 24 hours. AFTER that, configured the machine to the wireless internet and then commenced to download EVERYTHING. The IPAD is COOL. It goes EVERYWHERE and can do practically everything. And the really weird part about this whole thing is this....my daughter, who is 4, put a claim on MY IPAD?????? Uhhh...NO. The answer is GET YOUR OWN. Too funny; For real, we share. But she did put a claim on the IPAD. All right, 5 stars, the seller gets a thumbs up as well for making sure that the delivery parcel was NON-DESCRIPT and no other verbiage was on the box either to state what was in inside either - once again the seller get a thumbs on that. Anyways, Enthusiastic about how the purchase went down, the delivery and tracking as well the product itself.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 one and only
Reviews.Author: C. Daley "Painter"
Reviews.Content: Tried a cheap android tab and figured out why ipad2 16G was so much money!  IT'S WORTH IT!!! Go for it you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad2
Reviews.Author: de1293
Reviews.Content: Received the Apple iPad2 in excellent shape and within the time frame expected. The iPad2 worked out of the box and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A beautiful, fun toy hampered by the Apple ecosystem
Reviews.Author: Amadeuz
Reviews.Content: As a matter of full disclosure, I am normally a Windows OS and Android user. I won my iPad 2 as a holiday party prize from my workplace. Also, I do not own an Android tablet (yet). To avoid being labeled as a Fandroid, I will list what I liked about the iPad first (yes, there are things that Apple does well):- the hardware design is indeed well thought out: thin, light, and nice to look at- construction and quality appear to be top notch- the screen display is sharp and bright- iOS for all of its shortcoming runs very smoothly on this device- tons of apps in the App store- insane battery life -> This thing has the best battery life of any backlit display device I've ever used. It probably can go 4-5 days between chargings with average web usage.- instant on -> best thing about a tablet in general: instant web browsing- the perfect device for consuming media (Web browsing, videos, games) in bedNow, on to what I didn't like:- I have to use iTunes -> First thing that the tablet signaled for me to do was plug it in to the computer and install iTunes- no back button- Safari sucks -> First thing I downloaded from the app store was Dolphin HD- no expandable storage (well known)- no Flash -> sure Adobe has decided to stop supporting this for mobile devices, but for the moment there are still plenty of sites which use it. I was surprised by how many sites to which I can't view content. For a device which purports to be great at Web browsing, this kinda sucks.- limited customization of iOS - it's a tray of icons and that's it. Barely can be called an OS.Although I hate that the iPad doesn't have expandable storage, USB ports, etc, that is the Apple way. It always has been. The Apple ecosystem is very closed and restrictive. I am positive the iPad 3 won't have any USB ports on it either. However, the main reasons why I'm only giving this device 4 stars are: iTunes, iOS and the lack of Flash. For the amount people pay for this thing, you should be able to access 100% of the sites out there. All this being said, and it pains me to say it, Apple still has no equal in producing a sexy piece of high quality hardware. Disregarding specs (i.e. processor speed, RAM) the iPad 2 is still the benchmark hardware for tablets. Just think if this thing had flash, a USB port and you didn't need iTunes to access it from your computer. Now that would be something.One additional comment on tablet devices in general. Nobody NEEDS one of these things. They are, in my opinion, the ultimate in media consumption (videos, e-books, games, browsing, social networking) which is the opposite of productivity. Seriously, the main reason I wanted one was so I didn't have to wait the 120 seconds it takes to boot up my laptop to browse the Web. And also so I could browse literally anywhere in my house. Definitely, these are wants and not needs. Just a thought.

Reviews.Content: Hi,I like it a lot.Its handy and good for reading articles.love to play games in ipad than with iphone

I highly recommend this product as it leads the family of tablet technologies. Overall, a popular and renowned product. 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: IPad 2

Presentations to my clients, prospects and internal resources has been received with great paise. 90% of computer tasks are now complete and delivered from the iPad. Reviews.Title: 4th one!  Excellent seller!

Reviews.Content: My husband and I love our IPads!First I purchased a 16G, but used up most of the space with books, music and pictures.  So my husband got that one and I purchased a 64G (model 1). Love it. Reviews.Title: Can't live without this!

Reviews.Title: Good

Reviews.Content: When coupled with Bluetooth keyboard more than efficient enough for web surfing basic word processing etc.  Definitely recommend to anyone who craves portability

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to spend this much however I really enjoy the product. I already have an Iphone yet having a much larger screen is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Loving it so far...
Reviews.Author: Jamie Campbell
Reviews.Content: My order arrived faster than I expected. It seemed really easy to get it set up and start using. The only trouble I had was with iTunes and trying to get my music transferred over but I think that's me and not the iPad. So far, I'm loving it but I've only had it for a few days. Would have given it 5 stars but it cost $20 more than if I had bought it at the store. Pay the price for convenience I guess.

Reviews.Title: Amazed

Reviews.Content: I am really amazed at ipad on what it can do with this tiny processor. Browsing the web sometimes is noticeably slow, but it is not much worse than the experience on a powerfull windows machine.Good job.

Reviews.Content: I could have never imagine how a gadget would be such an important part of my daily life. iPad has quickly become my friend, my game buddy, my organizer, assistant and my handy search tool. It's amazing how thin it is and how fast all the applications work.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 Awesome Service

Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Content: My iPad has replaced my desk top my net book and is the fastest easiest to use! Portable convenient and perfect for quick info, social networking, music and movies. Easy to set up and fun to use. My first ever apple product. Love it and highly recommend it. I thought my Droid was cool but this is great!

Reviews.Content: My iPad is really fun to work with, the only problem I had was that I had downloaded NOOK ebooks while I was in the US, but forgot to download the link that enables me to read them. As I live in Europe, I can't download that link. Also I find that there are certain apps that don't work in Europe.

Reviews.Content: I purchased this Ipad2 for my daughter's birthday she is in love with it, she is starting college on Sept and that was the idea. There are so many things she can do with it. The purchase was smooth and the delivery was perfect.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! much more than the first gen
Reviews.Author: peatreat
Reviews.Content: i may be biased since i like most of the products that apple produces but i really like my ipad 2.  Its thin design, and ability to play things like hulu, netflix, mlbtv and more along with apps that let me stream videos from my HUGE desktop computer to my ipad are great!

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Camilo
Reviews.Content: Using this devices It's really simple, fast and exciting, thats why searching the web, listening to music, reading papers and others make the ipad fantastic for it. Apps are extremelly cool, I completly recommend it

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I really like the iPad 2, but it doesn't play some video formats like other pads out there.I do wish that I bought the iPad 2 with Wi-Fi + 3G.

Reviews.Title: Fab!
Reviews.Author: Heathcliff J. Miller
Reviews.Content: The product arrived late but I have enjoyed it ever since then. I am new to apple/Mac so I am getting accustomed to al, that it can do.I travel alot, so this small device helps considerably with space and weight, still allowing me to surf the net and chat with folks regularly online.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: One Nice Deal !
Reviews.Author: HoneyG
Reviews.Content: Placed my order and in Two days I received my iPad2 and after that all was well with me and my iPad2. No complaints the Order went well and I love my iPad2 !!!George

Reviews.Title: Non tech person review
Reviews.Author: Nontech44
Reviews.Content: Not being a techno-whiz, I need all the cue cards I can get. No cue cards w/ the iPad (original). No instruction book. Even w/ tutorials, lots of info re how to download ($),but no basics like how to access and play the music you have downloaded. Took LOTS of trial and error to figure out.On the up side, having a store nearby to take 1:1 classes is wonderful, and will learn much in short order.One other concern, I downloaded Sketchbook Pro to learn to draw in the computer. Present iPad technology requires a stylus pen w/ an eraser tip for iPad to "read" the marks you make. Any way to make a different type of interface sensitivity (pressure  vs electrical charge of skin) to enable a finer tip as needed? Yes, one can choose tips and brushes, but requiring so much surface of the eraser tip to create a line seems inefficient. Perhaps a wacom tablet would have been a better choice.Overall, it is amazing to have music, mail, drawing, search, calendar etc in such a small package.  The problems...no doubt more my abilities than the product.

Reviews.Title: The new personal computer
Reviews.Author: Andrew Peleikis "pillowcase1"
Reviews.Content: For years I had carried around a Newton Messagepad 2100; which was the most amazing portable touch screen device until the iPhone dropped in on the scene. But still the iPhone didn't really carry along the legacy of a useful, tablet computer that the Newton had hinted at back in 1997.As soon as I took my new iPad out of the box, I got the picture that there is something to this device that is more than a sum of its parts. After a few months; I keep saying this is the new personal computer. It will be laptops and desktops for work, and devices like the iPad for the rest of life. As it is, the iPad is almost that device - Its much more than I expected.I have zero gripes with the hardware. None. Its the most perfect piece of hardware I've ever used. The battery lasts forever, the screen is amazing (amazing!) - the smart cover is genius.Now that tethering with my iPhone works over bluetooth, portable internet is handled. Netflix, even facetime on the go is seamless.ANyhow I could go on. Its no replacement for a "computer" but does everything else right.I forgive you, Steve Jobs, for killing the Newton.Newton is dead. Long live iPad.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Out There!
