Reviews.Title: I pad 2
Reviews.Author: Turki .A. Basri
Reviews.Content: It's a great gadget. Very easy to use, even my 1 n 1/2  years doughter can use it, not kidding. The only three downsides I see  are the camera (very bad resolution), the flash problem and some of the apps are really expinsive.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is so sweet.
Reviews.Author: RichieRich
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 makes reading fun again. This is a must-have product. Simplifies my life while making news, education, books, and lifestyle easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase!  The shipping wasn't fast, but I requested super saver shipping.  I love using it!  I has almost totally replaced my computer!  It is incredibly easy to use.

Reviews.Title: iPad or computer?
Reviews.Author: Makayla
Reviews.Content: This thing is all some! If i had to chose from this or a computer I would chose this ( the IPad 2).

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: J. Bryan Turner "JBT"
Reviews.Content: I've only had my Ipad 2 a month so far but I love it and it's quickly become my favorite gadget  Thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: REALLY GREAT iPAD!
Reviews.Author: david1827
Reviews.Content: This is so much fun and really does it all! I am very happy I finally got one. Would make a great gift for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Ipad from seller Susan Hill
Reviews.Author: Martha Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of trash.  BEWARE of buying used items.  The Ipad was to have been received by Feb 28th.  It was not mailed from Ohio until March 7th and received March 12th.  The case and screen hare held together with a piece of plastic tape.  There are three cracks in the screen.  There is no charger included.  I am out almost $250.00 for someone's garbage.  There should be some type of recourse for a buyer in cases of this type,  I guess I could try Judge Judy.

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: RONALD FARRUGGIA
Reviews.Content: Constant issues with charging. Left several messages with seller, with no response. Have to play with cord and sometimes it charges, sometimes it don't. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Cliff Lohner
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  Its an Ipad.  Had no issues with it and its still working perfectly.  I previously had a 16 gb but it didn't have enough memory so I got the 64 gb.  I currently have I think around 6000 songs and 22 movies on there and I still have like 20 gb free...  Good buy...

Reviews.Title: Beware...
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: Was listed as "brand new and factory sealed". It came in the package open and non functional. (gray screen). It was also shipped without a charger. Buyer did refund money but was adimate that this item was brand new. Had a hard time communicating with them as well. Would not recommend them to a friend

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed .....
Reviews.Author: Ms. Tee
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I purchased this iPad with the impression that there was nothing wrong with it . Though it has no scratches the camera ( the most important part) doesn't work . My son was very dissapointed about this on Christmas . There was nothing written in the review about the camera not working ( I would have never purchased if it was stated ) now apple wants 250.00 to fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: P.A. McMichael
Reviews.Content: It has all the features I was looking for in a tablet and for a used item it's in great shape.

Reviews.Title: A very nice used ipad.  The seller was prompt in mailing it.  Goodd service.
Reviews.Author: Sue K. Nadeau "still reading and learning"
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize I need more memory for what I do.  combined with my iphone and Kindle, I really don't need the ipad.  I am considering re-selling it.

Reviews.Title: Great except Home button after yr 2
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I loved it. I've had it for about 2.5 years and it's been great...though the Home button has lost it's sensitivity and I have to push it hard to register. I've heard others with this model have the same problem.

Reviews.Title: IPAD Camara does not work!
Reviews.Author: Pam Heinz
Reviews.Content: The Camara on this device does not work; I don't live near an apple store and of course it is too late to return so I am out of luck!

Reviews.Title: It arrived just as product is described
Reviews.Author: Rosemary's kindle
Reviews.Content: This was a used item but it was just like new with the exception of a very small scratch on the back.. otherwise, looks and works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very good thx
Reviews.Author: eugene kirkham
Reviews.Content: Love it.the price was right.it came in like new condition . I was glad to see it at my house as soon as I did.ths for the fast service!,,

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Dina Marquez
Reviews.Content: My husband received it and really liked it.  The images are clear and it navigates fast.  Highly recommend it.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great IPAD 2- Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Daniel Schulaner
Reviews.Content: Even though It's an older IPAD, IPAD 2 has everything you need, to get the job done, and with the 64 GB of storage, you can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: Works fine except WiFi range limited
Reviews.Author: Marvin Bonner
Reviews.Content: Tablet was delivered on time... good condition with only a slight scratch on screen. Tablet works fine except the WiFi range seems to be limited. Will only connect with my router up to about 25 ft. Other devices in my house seem to connect several rooms away. Will probably have to return the ipad if I can't solve the WiFi issue. Would have rated 4 stars except for WiFi range.

Reviews.Title: Beware of iPad Shop
Reviews.Author: D. R. Stanley
Reviews.Content: My wife bought a supposedly new iPad 2 via Amazon which was supplied by the iPad Shop.  When I tried to register it Apple said it was out of warranty.  Long story short, this iPad ended up being a replacement for another unit sold by he iPad Shop back in 2011.  They received a replacement from Apple and sold it to my wife as new in September 2013.  While it might have been new it was recorded by Apple as a replacement to the original owner and thus received the warranty only at the time of return -- which by 2013 had long since expired.  Further, the serial number on the box did not match the serial number on the iPad.  After a back and forth with Apple customer service I finally ascertained that this was a replacement iPad intended for someone else and sold as new by the iPad Shop.  Apple's serial number tracking confirmed this.  It might have been a new unit but Apple changes the serial number on units they replace and would not warranty it beyond the "original purchase date".  Bottom line:  Go directly to Apple for their equipment.  That said, I'm not real pleased with Apple for failing to warranty an obviously new unit just because they assigned a new serial number to a customer who never received it.  I returned the iPad and bought another directly from Apple -- I'm not sure why.  Basically, I'm not pleased with either Apple or the iPad Shop.  But I am pleased with Amazon who noted that there have been similar complaints from this vendor and quickly refunded the purchase price.  Just beware of the iPad Shop.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Margaret Rhodes
Reviews.Content: The touchscreen doesn't work at all.  I will have to return it.  It was a Very disappointing birthday gift for my husband - I will have to send it back.

Reviews.Title: A Simple Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Viv
Reviews.Content: About two years ago, my now husband gave me an Ipad 2 for my birthday and it has been great. For easy access to your email, reading, downloading photos, working in the kitchen, quick searches, you name it, I go to my Ipad. So, this year, brainstorming about a nice, affordable gift for my husband who was going away on a trip to celebrate, the Ipad came up as a great choice. It allows him to do everything he would have to do on his computer while away, but on a much practical, easy to carry around, cool gadget.

Reviews.Title: Travel computer :)
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Pettit
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and bought this to keep up with my business and website while I'm away. I was not only able to purchase what I needed for an upcoming wedding for a client, but also did my online backing as well. I haven't found much that can't be done with an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Heavily flawed design.
Reviews.Author: MMSahler
Reviews.Content: Had this thing for a couple weeks now and it's essentially a glorified gameboy.The camera is total garbage- I mean my 1995 webcam was higher resolution. The speaker is on the rear of the ipad (why?!) making the poor audio quality and volume even worse. I have sensitive eyes and the brightness does not go nearly low enough to use comfortably in a dark room at night. The volume buttons don't adjust to when the ipad is rotated so I am constantly changing it in the wrong direction. The web access is dodgy even though my router is in my room and there's no signal issue. iOS is very lacking, notifications are tedious to turn off, ad block doesn't do bleep...Battery life is pretty much the only thing decent about this. Screen resolution is just OK. I honestly think this is worth about $50-100 at most. $400 can buy a much more versatile and powerful netbook.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: The Ipad came exactly has it was posted.  I would recommend this product to everyone that was interested in buying one.

Reviews.Title: It serves my needs.
Reviews.Author: Peapodpixi
Reviews.Content: I won't use the camera on the iPad. That sucks. However, I've been really pleased with the capacity and speed of this device. I use it to edit photos as well as video streaming and Internet surfing. Great for all my networking needs.

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am attached to my I pad like a  barnacle! I never put it down! My whole life is run using my iPad ! I work, play and socialize on this thing every day! THE BEST PURCHASE EVER!

Reviews.Title: Generic box
Reviews.Author: TBS
Reviews.Content: This item arrived in a generic box that was not the original packaging. This item was purchased as new but appeared to have been shipped to be in just a generic box not the original apple packaging. The item did not appear to be new or in original package.

Reviews.Title: The thing that converted me to Apple products once and for all
Reviews.Author: Fryersoncaptain
Reviews.Content: I've always been a bit eclectic in terms of the hardware and software of my various electronic devices. I have a laptop running Ubuntu, a 2008 iMac desktop (I got it as a birthday present mere weeks before the '09 model debuted), I've used many Android devices (two phones and a tablet), and the only e-book reader I've ever used is a Kindle.That having been said, after using the iPad, I'm completely won over to Apple. The build quality is superior to other products, the interface is smooth and responsive, and the software library (as is well known at this point) is incomparably large.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: charlotte
Reviews.Content: I can't rate the ipad yet because it came without a power cord so it is basically unusable.  But when I let Amazon know of my problem I received (as always) excellant customer service from Rajasekhar.  I work in customer service industry myself & know what good customer service is.  I am always pleased with Amazon service.  I am sure once I get a power cord I will like my ipad 2 very much.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished, but had a faulty docking port.
Reviews.Author: Roberta A. Thornton
Reviews.Content: The item came looking like new, but I soon realized the sound would shut off and had to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 - It is a find tablet, but is it for you?
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I will be the first to admit - I am an android lover (it is such a cute little robot).  More importantly, I am also a techie, so it was inevitable that curiosity would eventually kill the cat (cat being the product loyalty).  When I decided that I wanted to see if iPads live up to the hype, I didn't want to go all out - I wasn't going to purchase a plan from a phone company that will overcharge me for limited data use - especially not when I can tether devices to my phone!  I also wasn't going to pay at least $100 more to get a retina display since I view it as unnecessary for me- certainly not worth the extra money (even if I do have an instinct to have the latest and greatest). I decided that the iPad2 16GB would be appropriate to base my decision!The iPad is a good looking piece of hardware - but I would say that the software left me feeling limited in what I was able to do.Pros:-It's pretty - I do love a good looking piece of technology, and in that, the iPad does not disappoint-I like the multitouch gesturesCons:-Heavy if you are reading in bed-Edges around the screen mean that I have to stretch my thumbs that much further if I am trying to hold and manipulate the device with both hands (you can always cradle it in one arm and manipulate with the other, but it just feels odd no matter how you do it)-No expandable memory - there are very few android tablets that do not offer this- get with the program apple-the App Store was not user friendly and was stubborn when connectivity wasn't fast-I find the settings app to be all over the place - settings for a single app may be in three different places (wouldn't it be nice to get into an individual app's settings from within that app)Overall, if you are looking for something simple to use and don't want to be able to do anything too indepth the iPad is a perfectly adequate choice.  iOS is very straight forward, and generally user friendly as long as you don't want to change settings for them (ie you want to use default settings)- otherwise, you may have to go on a hunt for the exact setting you are looking for (if it even exists).  I have no plan to get rid of my iPad - it works in a pinch and if I am doing something that may be hazardous to my technology, I would bring my iPad, but ultimately, I still prefer my android tablets!

Reviews.Title: FLASH-the IPad is a nuisance!
Reviews.Author: James S. Kelley "bogwood"
Reviews.Content: I have had the 5.1 for almost a year.  The lack of flash/adobe is now driving me to google.  The device is OK but too many of the websites I visit use flash player.  The workarounds are also a nuisance.  There will probably be frustrations with the google device but I have had it with Apple.

Reviews.Title: It's a cool product for me!
Reviews.Author: Poohbear
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Apple product I've ever owned.  The first one being the littlest Ipod from years ago.  I'm pretty impressed by it, along with my lil daughter, when she saw it being charged, she screamed "Ipad!!!"  lol.  The only thing that bummed me out was when it came with no battery life at all.  I had to charge it while getting the Ipad2 all set up, needless to say, it was stuck to the charger for couple of hours, while I downloaded free apps. I did notice it immediately registered Verizon, but I have AT&T; wireless internet at home and this was meant to be just Wifi only.  And not for long, it started asking if I want to add more data now or later before I can proceed with browsing.  That was an easy fix and I was able to modify it to just Wifi only. It then asked for IOS6 update while in the midst of downloading apps.  And after that, it was just smooth sailing and I made sure to enable some restrictions so my 4 yr old won't be buying any in-apps accidentally.  Read too much horror stories on that.  I did tell her to never click on the word "buy" because that would mean, it will take money away from Mommy!  LOL  Overall, quite happy with my big purchase.  I know this ain't the newest Ipad model but to me, it's good enough!And I am as pleased with the case and the screen protector I bought here in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: tika
Reviews.Content: The iPad two is great! It has a great 9 inch screen which is easy to carry around but not too small so you can see things very easily on it. It also has the option of choosing a different color which is great. All other tablets only come in black but I love the option of being able to choose a different color. It is light weight for its size and has great battery life. I recommend buying one today! :)

Reviews.Title: They lied about the Apple Care
Reviews.Author: Crystal A. Wright
Reviews.Content: The ipad is beautiful. Works perfectly, however I chose this ipad from this seller because the description said that the ipad was covered under applecare.Upon receipt, I couldn't find any applecare contract.I emailed REPEATEDLY and asked how long remained on the agreement. While they responded, they NEVER answered that question and just kept saying things like:On 8/17/12 12:10 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:Hi, Apple only needs the serial numbers on the back of the iPad for AppleCare.-----------On 8/18/12 8:58 AM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:You only need the serial number for warranty, I have gotten warranty manytimes for my macbook pro. It doesn't need to be registered to your name.---------------On 8/19/12 2:52 PM, "Nimlow Electronics - Amazon Marketplace"<[e-mail address removed]> wrote:you can check the warranty expiration on apple website using the serialnumberWhen I called Apple, I found out from apple that it was the orig manu warranty & there was 100 days left. But No APPLECARE at all, which includes phone and in person customer support.So I just paid $79.00 for Apple Care.It's hard to do business with people that you cannot trust. Be careful with this company.

Reviews.Title: The pad
Reviews.Author: Miss Vee
Reviews.Content: This is  a very  nice  ipad very easy to carry around expecially when you are traveling around i would recommand this item for everyone to buy.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Demarco "D P DEMARCO"
Reviews.Content: Got the ipad very quickly.  It works terrific & I'm very happy.  Only thing is, I wish it had vibrate set-up as I am deaf.  Thank you for being very professional about the sale & delivery.

Reviews.Title: I love it when things work the way they'r supposed to...
Reviews.Author: quotetaker "Tom Morrow"
Reviews.Content: Having purchased two new I-Pads from Apple, I later purchased a "refurbished" I-Pad-2 for a friend. It was delivered on the date it was promised and, for the past month, it has worked the way it supposed to work. He's extremely happy, and, of course, so am I. There are two purchase points I have steadily had positive results: Amazon.com and Apple. They do exactly as they promise and their stuff works the way advertised!

Reviews.Title: IPad2
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the IPad2 after reading several reviews about the new Ipad's internet connection issue. IPad2's setup was very easy. I already have an ITunes account so it took minutes to get started. It took less then 5 minutes to get my secured internet connection working. I was disappointed that I can not play any games through my steam account. The application only lets me chat with other users so hopefully steam will provide an application that allows you to play your purchased games using IPad. I really like being able to use Kindle's and Overdrive's readers in order to read ebooks. I plan to install VMWare on the machine so I can use it to work with .net applications.

Reviews.Title: From Toy to Tool
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Ingold
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad 2 after I had accidentally sat on my Kindle on an airplane and needed to make a decision - do I replace the Kindle or go with the iPad.  I had always told my wife that her iPad was little more than a toy, but once I got mine, my world began to change.  Sure, I have 40+ games downloaded, so I definitely enjoy the "toy" factor, but I also use it to take notes at meetings, keep up to date on emails and have even used "docs to go" for verbal presentations.  It has become an awesome tool in my life.

Reviews.Title: I pad
Reviews.Author: coop
Reviews.Content: The I pad two has been such a wonderful tool for my students.  I work I six different schools and having this is easy to transport and so versatile .  Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Simply awesome.
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take on a trip and love having access to e-books, my email and other things. Much more lightweight than my laptop and way less cumbersome. Since there is WIFI everywhere now, I don't use the Verizon service much, but if I need its there :-). Just a really great product!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in myself
Reviews.Author: daisygirl
Reviews.Content: I purchased a refurbished Ipad2 and loved it until I realized I made a mistake by not getting the one with the +3g.  I now find out that I cannot get a internet connection through a provider so I cannot take it on the road or anywhere they do not have WIFI.  I still love the IPAD2....I just wish I would have investigated more into the product.  Hope this helps someone else from making the same mistake.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablets - Best for sure!
Reviews.Author: excrivo
Reviews.Content: We love it, since we got this this Xmas, our kids and everyone loves it.. Hands down best products in the world.Love the Cloud to synch with my iphone4S.Love it.

Reviews.Title: This is a great tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Soldano
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet computer. I've used it for a few months now and have had no problems.It does everything I want, and its quick, light, and has an excellent display. It seems to be less susceptible to fingerprints than other devices I own.

Reviews.Title: Very fast delivery!!
Reviews.Author: IPad 2 Received!!
Reviews.Content: So excited!! I ordered the IPad 2 on Tuesday afternoon and it was received in my office on Friday morning!! So not expected. The product was packaged wonderfully and ready for use. There were no scratches or dents...nothing on it that I would be surprised of. Thank you for such a quick delivery. This will definitely give me time to familiarize myself prior to the start of my hiring season in the next couple of weeks!The iPad is in wonderful condition. I am so glad that I ordered the Verizon version. The data package deals are not too bad and can be purchased directly from the iPad. The apps are super fun and the apps that I will use for my kids are not that expensive, between 2 and 5 dollars. A note to self would be that IBM Lotus notes is not immediately compatible with Mac. The installation looks as if it happens, but the id name does not install. There are Youtube videos with instructions, but I am not the most computer savvy so I do not necessary understand the instructions. Microsoft office works well and all other programs that I have installed.Have a wonderful day!

Reviews.Title: Excelent product and service , very happy!
Reviews.Author: MOM23
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my husband on christmas time, It arrived promptly and my husband have been using it since having a great experience with his Ipad II he is very happy and me too!

Reviews.Title: In love
Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: With my iPad 2. This thing is great. It's fast and fun. My daughter plays on it and I can literally replace my computer with it. So happy I got this.

Reviews.Title: JUst like new!
Reviews.Author: JY
Reviews.Content: This Ipad is in a very good condition, and works very well. I saved some money from it and I think you don't need to buy a brand new since there is no difference between them.

Reviews.Title: I pad  64GB Wifi 3g
Reviews.Author: suz
Reviews.Content: I love the product.  It works well and is easy to carry.  I have lots of fun with it and can hardly put it down.  The only thing I don't like (and this isn't Amazons fault) is the report from the New York Times on the working conditions in China at the Apple Product factories.  I would not have gotten the I Pad had I known about this in advance.

Reviews.Title: My ipad2
Reviews.Author: Arlene Staffeldt
Reviews.Content: I am an old person who loves electronics and my ipad is just another of my electronic purchases. Amazon is my place to purchase all my needs for my gadgets. Thank ypou very much.

Reviews.Title: Not a whole lot different from Ipad 1
Reviews.Author: Lois Uphold
Reviews.Content: When buying this I thought this had 3g but it didn't so all in all other than the additional camera that the Ipad 1 does not have I really don't see a whole lot of difference between the two. Now not to say I could be missing something, don't think so though. It's still pretty cool ipad though. I myself still use my laptop more than my Ipad. A must have for some just not me I guess.

Reviews.Title: Great product! Worth the money! (reiview may still need revising)
Reviews.Author: moon fox
Reviews.Content: You are there, standing in the middle of the electronics department, credit card in hand, about to spend hundreds of dollars on a touch pad you can trust to be worth the money, and a good product. The store clerks are saying different things to you about each pad, and you don't know who to trust. Ladies and Gentlemen, the I Pad 2 is the correct item for you! It consists of app selection, optional WiFi, and other sources such as 4g. Coasting around the range of $800.00, I would suggest this particular system over any of the other available touch pads. I tried another once. I didn't like it. I would choose ipad2 over a regular i pad. why? many reasons..It is faster.it looks better based on the fact that it is so thin..Its the newest version, so why not take a go before it gets outdated?The following are my views on this remarkable contraption. Also, I'm just going to call the I pad 2 an i pad just to make it easier. Just know that the I pad and I pad 2 are 2 different products. Sometimes, i will call it an i pad 2, but just so no one gets confused while reading this, there's a fact. Hope they help!First facts: This was a bummer, but based on Apple restrictions, the i pad 2 does not have flash, so it can't play online games or run certain programs that need flash. There is also no place for discs or flash drives, so you can't download saved work such as the data on flash drives or discs. You can't download programs like Microsoft office programs on this particular item, which is not fortunate, not to mention the fact that it doesn't connect to the printer. Hopefully some day it will evolve into better stats.Camera: For the most part i like the camera, but based on the fact i haven't seen or interacted with many other i pads except my own, which has a crooked, bury camera, it wasn't the best for me, but the other touch pad i owned had a horrible camera. I don't know how the other cameras look on the i pad 2 because i don't bother to put pictures of myself out into the public on the store tester i pads, so, keep the camera idea something to check on before buying. On the camera though you can make it look straigt ahead like a regular video camera or make it face the way you are looking at the screen, so it flips around depending on what kind of picture you want. I give MY experience on the camera a B gradeApp selection: Great apps! Many apps are free, but 1 app's full version wasn't free on the i pad like it was on my other pad. I still don't think that should be a problem. Also the apps appear with fewer selections on the screen based on certain categories then my other touch pad, which appeared in a long list that was helpful. Although i would beleive that all together the ipad 2 has a wider selection of apps. Unlike some touch pads, The i pad 2 offers netflix, and many other apps that are one of the reasons i got the i pad in the first place. Great quality. I give the apps a A grade.Battery: The battery doesn't last very long. Sometimes, it last a long time, but for the most part, I always have it charging. This is a issue if i want to travel with it. I'm going to have to get a i pad car charger... Anyway, the battery issue may just be with only MY i pad 2 but I'm not really sure. I would give this category a C or B grade, but it has some work to do before it reaches an A.App download speed: The apps for the most part download quickly, but there has been some times where the apps don't make any progress with loading so i usually have to delete it (and pray it will actually download) and download it again. In the end i always get ti worked out but its like, "Come ON!" you know? I give this category a A for it's amazing speed!WiFi quality: I love this category. Mine plays most H.D. videos and can just download apps from its app store rather then having to connect it to the computer to download things. That i can really appreciate. I can open up nearly all web-sights just the way they would appear on the internet unlike my last touch pad. I would say in order to get the full i pad 2 experience WiFi is a must-have. I give WiFi a A for great function!Speakers: Lets put it this way, the speakers... they could use some work. Sometimes when i have it to the maximum sound it is hard to hear. That is not something that i favor based on the fact that the i pad is like, 40% sound, but i still like the product. If you have this problem i suggest going to a quieter area or plugging in ear phones to assure you get the most out of your money.Covers: I don't have a smart-cover. Perhaps the smart-covers do save the battery and make the screen sleep when you put the cover over it, but i have a cover that's not a smart-cover and it is just fine. As long as you turn it off when not in use for long periods of time any covers should work. Note that the cover should fit nicely around the i pad 2, that way, it is a better buy and protects the i pad more. i would suggest a case to help protect it and make a nice little stand for it. You can't exactly rate a cover because there are many different ones, but here is my rate on how important a cover is to have to me. A B. Its optional, but a good idea.App Usage speed: Most of the apps i use are great, fast, functional, and don't have jerky movements. Take Talking Friends apps for example. They are fun, functional, and fast. Just how it should be, not to mention very clever. There isn't much to say about this particular category, but let me just say it deserves a A or B for nice function.Note where there should have been another Category view: I haven't had really any interaction with a regular i pad, so i can't say if the i pad 2 is really "new and improved", but i can say its good for me and very fast. Keep that in mind.Video and Photo booth: I love making videos, so i was happy to hear that the i pad 2 came with a camera ready to make some videos! It is a personal highlight. Also photo booth is fun. seeing what your pictures look like in x-ray vision, and flipped, and so much more. I really liked that. too bad you can't film videos in photo booth :( Also note that both of these are the free apps that come right when you get the i pad. the video is connected to camera app.Personal Favorites: I love the i pad 2, but my favorite features about it, are the following:.Its very thin and simple, which is very neat..The apps are great and so are their function..A i pad without WiFi is a very sad i pad..Videos and photo booth..speed!-------> ZOOMGRAND CLOSING..These are all my opinions of different category in the i pad 2. Comment if there is more you want to know about the i pad 2 and i will see if i have an answer to add to this review for you. Thanks for reading! Hope it helped!!

Reviews.Title: Another winner for Apple.
Reviews.Author: cenobite
Reviews.Content: All I can say about the iPad 2 is that it is simply amazing. The faster 1 ghz dual core A5 processor is a workhorse. The display is very high quality and is very easy on the eyes. Watching movies and surfing the web over WiFi is a joy, especially compared to the iPhone 4 which I have and love, but the limited browsing capabilities of the iPhone is enough to make you want for something larger. For iPhone users, the interface is familiar and easy to adapt to, and for new users, it is easy to learn. The iPod and Videos features are nice to have when travelling, and for those who like to read, the iBooks app is a capable book reader and there are thousands of ePub books and PDF files out there to load up on. For people that use Office to write letters and school papers, there is the iLife office suite which is Office compatible in most cases.There is a bonus for musicians. The iPad is becoming a professional tool for musicians with a plethora of music utilities, software synths (including a few Moog products), guitar amp simulators and even Garage Band to write and record on the go. The only thing is I wish it were more of an open platform and I wish it had stereo speakers, although most times I listen with earbuds.If you are thinking of the Kindle Fire or an Android tablet, the only advice I can give is DON'T ... The iPad 2 is a great tablet, and is constantly growing to meet the needs of all different types of users.

Reviews.Title: It is NOT a PC replacement
Reviews.Author: Ivy
Reviews.Content: It's an Itouch or an Iphone but bigger: nothing more. I have clients contacting me wanting to get it so they can do this and that with it, and quite frankly it's not best for that.I recently gotten one and I love it. I turn it on instantly, look something up, entertain myself with games, etc.However it does have it's limitations, and the most annoying thing is it does not support Adobe Flash which limits you on many websites: NOT THOSE KIND OF WEBSITES!!!I like Apple products for the most part they are a solid product. But their direction at times is completely narrow-minded like not support Adobe Flash.For what it is I will give it 4 stars, minus one for their lack of support in other areas. Hopefully that will change one day.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: zahrah
Reviews.Content: i love it so much. it is an amazing product. it is Small size and swish at the same time works very excellent. also my friends like it.

Reviews.Title: Good product, arrived early
Reviews.Author: Jamal
Reviews.Content: Product received early and in excellent shape.. certainly exceeded my expectations. The iPad is great and exactly as perscribed. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Novagoth
Reviews.Content: Ive had my Ipad2 for 3 weeks now and found that i cant put it down. I aldready have the Iphone 4 and the Ipod touch 16 gig model. What i love about apple is the inner connectivity between all 3 products. Icloud hasnt been a disappointment and love all the great apps. Its very customizable to fit all your needs and has really improved my daily living. though id like to have gotten the higher storage model for the storage but the price is very high. The cameras are great and takes great pictures. resolution for gaming is great and video chat has worked well with staying in contact with family and friends. the Ipad is a great size and very convienant to carry. i used to carry a large laptop everywhere. it was very heavy and alot to set up. This has made life alot easier and travel alot more plesant. Ive been very happy with apple products and look forward to the future and thier new systems

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Haseena
Reviews.Content: After five months of using a 16GB iPad 2 WiFi (no 3G), I can honestly say that it is one of the most useful technology purchases I can think of. While its price may be a little expensive I defiantly think it's worth every penny.Part of the reason the iPad  is perfect for travel is that you can use it in any position, unlike a laptop, where you have to find a seat It won't ever got hot or overheat. Personally, I've had a couple laptops expire on me due to overheating. You always have to keep them on a firm surface so you don't block the vents. The iPad doesn't have these problems. You no longer have to grab a tray or giant book to set your laptop on when using it in bed.Video Skype works great on this tablet - the cameras make showing people things FAR simpler due to the front and back placement.The battery life is excellent! This thing can go for two days without a recharge! And that's with fairly heavy usage (try that with a laptop!)The touchscreen is extremely responsive, the machine is very fast - wifi works extremely well.The only issue I have is the reflective screen - I am not a fan of the reflective screen and have ordered a matte screen protector - not because I feel it needs protecting, but because I want to be able to read in various lighting conditions.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable!!!
Reviews.Author: mate
Reviews.Content: I was not sure if I'm gonna get a black or white but I'm very glad I got the white cuz it's really coooool!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, hice mi compra desde Venezuela y el aparato llego a tiempo y en perfecto estado, altamente recomendado el vendedor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: CRiley10
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this item (iPad 2, 16gb, black) for work. He loves it. We still have been unable to update it to iOS 5 because our wifi kept disconnecting on wifi on laptop but I think when we do that it will be faster. First day he had some slowness but not everything is great. We looked at getting some of the tablets on the android market and went to best buy to review. I liked the idea because the androids are more customizable but had reservations because 1. They are about the same price as iPads 2. Wasn't sure if I wanted to take that risk. 3. I have iPhones and know how dependable they are. However I found the toshiba thrive and it was cheaper. So that was our main focus. Toshiba thrive vs. iPad 2. On one hand the toshiba had USB ports, sd card ports and customization options, on the other if was not familiar with it. So we tried them both at best buy. Toshiba thrive looked better. It's graphics looked more fun, apps are cheaper..mostly free and all that. But it was more complicated, which i love because I like to tween things. My husband on the other hand...does not. So he wanted iPad...I wanted toshiba thrive but we wanted to talk to somebody who knew more about it. So we grabbed a guy who only deals with tablets. He said he has an android phone and likes it but as far as tablets go he said hands down iPad won. Reason was that apple makes one specific hardware for iPads. So they had it perfected. All their apps and music were specifically made for apple hardware so it had very little problems. Android market on the other hand is made from many different tablets, that are all made by different hardware. Therefore, if an app is made on a toshiba thrive, it may work great, but if you download it for your samsung thrive, the hardware is different so you are going to have more freezes with all, crashes or lack of working at all.In conclusion, iPad 2 so far is more dependable and perfected. I do believe however, with time, the android market will be more perfected. As of now, I am siticking with my iPad 2!

Reviews.Title: Great for business purposes
Reviews.Author: Tailgater
Reviews.Content: I am pretty new to this tablet market but after having this iPad for about a week. I am for the most part impressed.Packaging: Apple has always impressed when it comes to their packaging. The box is very sleek and makes you very happy with your purchaseSetup: Now since this is only the wifi version, it doesn't require much setup.Now after everything was setup, I had fun connecting downloading all the apps and seeing what neat things I could do with it. I have an iPhone so I was apply to move over all my photos, songs, files, etc to the iPad and it was very easy. The plan for this iPad is to use in meetings and allow the customers to flip through the pictures or files that I am showing.Downfalls: The issues I have been having with this is that since I only have an iPhone 3GS, the tethering (personal hotspot) can only be connect through bluetooth so the internet isn't as fast as through wifi. I also wish there was some sort of case that comes with the iPad. I had to spend an additional $50 for a case to protect it. The front cases that Apple make I find are not helpful at all in terms of protection so I wish Apple would offer a better of assortment of accessories rather than having to buy 'made for the ipad' products.Overall I am quite happy and am enjoying the iPad. I do quite a bit of flying so this will make my flights more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Love my I Pad
Reviews.Author: Jack S
Reviews.Content: 1. I love this new toy of mine, I can sit around being lazy and surf the web or do my emails. Oh yea...the family that did not think they would like it......just say we fight over it now. Buying it through Amazon was a breeze, got it quick with no problems. I even used my credit card points to pay for it with ease. Get one for you!

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: LCR "keyteacher"
Reviews.Content: I am more than pleased with my new ipad2.  I struggled with the decision to buy it but it was a good decision.One unexpected plus was I found it was so easy to use the free Kindle app to move all my Kindle books over to the iPad.  Now I can read from either device and my husband and  I don't fight over the Kindle anymore.One negative is that I was  surprised and disappointed that there was no user's manual included.  At the price one pays I think it is pretty cheap of Apple to not include a manual . . . What other device or piece of equipment that costs $600+ doesn't come with instructions for use?

Reviews.Title: I love my I pad
Reviews.Author: Jessica S. Madden "jmadsnowco"
Reviews.Content: Who can not love the easiest of all computers. this is an I phone but bigger .. Thank you for making it not ring .. Lol .. I got the I phone then the I pad .. Now everything in this house is Mac product ., I have no need for a Pc anymore make is so much easier no I am not a computer guru. I am computer illiterate and I find Mac is way easier to use.. Thank you Mac I am a huge fan

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: Doris Sciaccotta
Reviews.Content: After researching tons of tablets, I've come to the conclusion that it is worth it to spend a little more for the ipad2.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 review
Reviews.Author: rjmoreano
Reviews.Content: Great buy!!! Love the Ipad!!! I use it for work, at home!!!!I recommend it very much!!!And it is not expensive for what you can do with it!!!

Reviews.Title: The best tablet by far.
Reviews.Author: Raul Ernesto Isea L "Raul I."
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just perfect, it has the right screen size and weight. If you are looking for a tablet for diverse use: classes, gaming, work pressentations it will suit you just right. Remember to buy a protector for the back, since it looks great, but it's delicate and it may get scratched.

Reviews.Title: Nice but no flash player
Reviews.Author: oravla
Reviews.Content: It is very nice but lacks flash player, therefore it is not very useful as a browser. Plus: many applications and intuitive interface. Cons: no flash player, expensive applications, some applications lack basic functionality (like lists in Twitter).  The worst: Is not environmentally friendly and when the battery runs dead you have to throw it away.

Reviews.Title: Nice. Brand New. Perfect packaging!
Reviews.Author: AmazOWN
Reviews.Content: Simply to say, I got it wrapped and brand new on the time and date that I was told I will.Love it! This is going to be the best present for my mom =)I trust the seller -  ConcordLLC ; and of course amazon has the best customer service!Overall I am very satisfied with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Nice Step Up
Reviews.Author: P Magnum
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is a nice step up from the first generation iPad.  The new thin design only is a reason to select the 2nd generation model over the first.  Much more like a tablet than the first one, the new sleek design is lighter and feels much better in your hands.  Of course the camera is a big difference and it allows you to do things like Skype.  There are some other changes like a doubling of the RAM size, but those first two features are the ones that will immediately jump out at you.  After that, it operates the same as the first generation iPad and is truly one of the cooler tech devices out on the market.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, Wife loves it!!!
Reviews.Author: Darryl
Reviews.Content: Bought this Ipad 2 for my wife as a birthday gift and she loves it. I wish the 5meg camera took better pictures. But a great system to check emails, surf the net, etc, etc. Ipad 2 is very fast and main connection excellent.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product, Excellent Packaging & Shipping
Reviews.Author: Sanooya
Reviews.Content: What can I say?the iPad is clearly the best in Tablets, and this is Generation 2 So it's just Amazing!I'll skip talking about the device and it facilities, cuz it's everywhereabout the seller and shipping, actually first I was a little bit afraid of ordering from a seller, because all my previous orders were from / fullfilled by Amazonbut eery thing went very smooth and easy, i Think processing took less than a day, and it was shipped and i got it in my mail box after 4 or 5 days (including weekends)I'm an International customer, I got it shippied from Seller to my Aramex Shop and Ship Box then Aramex sent it to me in Bahrainit arrived safe, brand now as it is from the factory, packaging was ExcellentIf I needed to order any similar thing, I will sure buy it again from Stoobie if it's offered by themThank You

Reviews.Title: Friendly Review
Reviews.Author: Thomas D
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my buddy to give to his wife for their anniversary.  After weeks, finally just heard from him and they love it so much it goes everywhere with them.  No issues of any kind.  Excellent!

Reviews.Title: amazing but...
Reviews.Author: Jalali,Haitham
Reviews.Content: I have the ipad 2  for a month now . Its an amazing device the style , wieght and size r amazing . the device is great in everything  but the still camera is absolutly garbage ,apple shouldve done better job in this area and one morething the screen shouldve been ratina like the iphone. anyway to me if u have ipad one dont upgrade to ipad 2 wait for 3 but if u dont u really shoud get one .

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2 3g WIFI
Reviews.Author: I. Lenmark "Forevermore"
Reviews.Content: I love my IPAD 2! I can't leave our house without this wonderful device. It meets my need to be connected, for reading and most of all books and apps for my little one. I'm glad I waited for the IPAD 2, it's thinner and lighter than the first gen. I'm hoping it will also be helpful for when I start grad school. I can't wait to get my Piel Frama folio case which will be the home and protection of my IPAD 2.

Reviews.Title: Too many problems
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kenney "DJ"
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted one for Christmas and leap before I looked. The biggest problem is using the payment system for buying apps, movies, etc.. Just google it and you will find the problems are widespread. It won't accept giftcards type credit cards after the first one. They try to force you to use a credit card with large ranges so they can charge you up like cell phone companies do. I will never trust their products ever again and look forward to getting rid of this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: I really don't like this IPad
Reviews.Author: Donna L.
Reviews.Content: I am sorry that I got this IPad. I wished I would have gotten an android. This IPad doesn't do what I expect of it. Also it is nothing like my LapTop. There was no directions to this stupid thing and that is discouraging. I wished I would also got something that you can insert a scan disk card. I wouldn't recommend it unless you like Apple.and know how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: I love anything apple
Reviews.Author: Bailey Pappas "BaileyP"
Reviews.Content: Apple has done it again. People all over the world love Macs, Ipods, iPhones, and iPads. I love my iPad 2! I use it just like a regular laptop...Since I can run windows 7 I am able to run programs on it now..... : ) Because programs give you more control than apps, am I correct? & I surf the web, play games, and more. <3 You Steve Jobs!!!!

Reviews.Title: best product ever!!
Reviews.Author: namoola
Reviews.Content: i have an iPad 2 , i use it lots of times! it makes me feel special to have it, i got many games on it, i share and play with my friends and family ,it is so thin that i ant travel with it .

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Georgia Shopper
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative can be said about this product. Great item, arrived within days of order in perfect condition.  Ready to use right out of the box.  Great experience from this supplier.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful toy and cyber-companion
Reviews.Author: Dan Elliott Jr.
Reviews.Content: My i Pad is a wonderful product, I am happy I bought it.It is easy to use, as intuitive as can be, and is a delight to own and use.So far, (two weeks after delivery), I ha ve downloaded a few games, plus chess, and a book, plus my subscription to two magazines.The iPad is kind of like a cyber-friend, it is there at the ready to play or do whatever, just like a happy puppy.  As a matter-of-fact, were I in charge of product-naming at Apple, this thing would have been named the iPuppy, it is just a fun creation all the way.Had I to do it again, I would repeat the purchase.Dan Elliott Jr.

Reviews.Title: best product ever!!
Reviews.Author: namoola
Reviews.Content: i have an iPad 2 , i use it lots of times! it makes me feel special to have it, i got many games on it, i share and play with my friends and family ,it is so thin that i ant travel with it .

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Georgia Shopper
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative can be said about this product. Great item, arrived within days of order in perfect condition.  Ready to use right out of the box.  Great experience from this supplier.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful toy and cyber-companion
Reviews.Author: Dan Elliott Jr.
Reviews.Content: My i Pad is a wonderful product, I am happy I bought it.It is easy to use, as intuitive as can be, and is a delight to own and use.So far, (two weeks after delivery), I ha ve downloaded a few games, plus chess, and a book, plus my subscription to two magazines.The iPad is kind of like a cyber-friend, it is there at the ready to play or do whatever, just like a happy puppy.  As a matter-of-fact, were I in charge of product-naming at Apple, this thing would have been named the iPuppy, it is just a fun creation all the way.Had I to do it again, I would repeat the purchase.Dan Elliott Jr.

Reviews.Title: What can I say that hasn't been said already?
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Great product, very addictive, I have move all the things that I wasn't suppose to do in my laptop to the iPad 2 (internet browsing, personal email, pictures, movies, calendars, TV, news, e-Books, etc) it seems just like the right device for it, so now my laptop is only for work.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: ***** NEW IPAD2 $498.88  *****
Reviews.Author: Joe Gump "Joe Gump"
Reviews.Content: I just received a new IPAD2 delivered for $510.90.I looked at Amazon no luck.  I tried Ebay, no luck. I tried Apple.com, Apple Store, and Best Buy.On Google I found J&R.com.;  Jaques at ext.1015 sold me a new iPad2 in black.  I paid $498.88 plus $12.02 for two-day UPS.  The iPad2 arrived in two weeks.  I paid no sales tax and no CA recycle fee.  They sell all models.This was a great experience.  Since then, I bought an easy set-up Medialink wireless router, a bargain Casecrown protective case, and a couple capacitive pens, all from Amazon. Everything a great deal.  Also, check out Amazon's price on the AppleCare Protection Plan.

Reviews.Title: Powerful iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Abbas Fathy
Reviews.Content: I owned iPad 1 but, I was surprised when iPad 2 comes out. I was in need for more speed, camera, more battery life (10 hours) and more monitor resolution. Now, I have more satisfaction but still we are in need for Flash module and more development to let us use it instead of our laptop. I am using it for my project management work, some photo / movie editing, emails, presentation, Internet browsing, to do list calendar, friends caring, Facebook, and more. I compared it with motorols Xoom tablet but, I choosed the iPad 2. I love iPad 2 and I have a lot of ideas for it's required development and I hope to get a Chanel to communicate with Apple the greatest company around the world. Also, I have the Mac mini iPod and iPhone. I recommend the iPad 2 as the best tablet in the market.

Reviews.Title: damaged product
Reviews.Author: Tara Nevola
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Apple iPad 2, and received it rater quickly, within three days.  However when I went to sync it and also connect it with my wi-fi, it wouldn't connect or Sync.  I immediately brought it to apple and they said it was an internal error, a glitch.  After trying to manipulate the iPad to work, they eventually gave me a brand new one.  Thankfully, being Apple and standing behind their product 100% I received a new working iPad.

Reviews.Title: Get a netbook or a palm pilot (if you can find one)
Reviews.Author: Charlene Sanders "Htuna2"
Reviews.Content: I received this from my employer.Here are my observationsPros:LightweightPortableSurf InterneteReaderCons:Device is slippery - definitely need case or other backing or it could easily be droppedScreen can easily be scratched  unless you have a stand or some way of keeping it off your deskKeyboard is lacking tab, arrow keys,  switching between letters and numbers/symbols is inconceivable for a device you type on.  3rd keyboard for  special characters, keyboard covers up screen. During online chat the chat window from agent disappeared when I started typing.Making corrections to this review I can't scroll down to information I already typed.  No arrow keys,  had to preview then edit, the hit return then delete returns.Hard to place cursor between letters even using a stylusIn app store some games say they are free but eventually you must buy to continue.  Many of the thousands of apps are games and not many useful apps for business.Hard to scroll in form (like this on).  Every time I try to place the cursor I get a pop to cut, copy etcReading books hard because thumb placement on device can inadvertently turn pages or other thumb can take you out of book and to the desktop. Also must hold iPad to read comfortably.Battery life is okay but I expected more (been using for 2 hours am down to 63% from fully charged, now down to 54%You need a computer as you have to sync with iTunes.  Also, have not found a way to delete apps off iPad without iTunesNo USB ports, only expandable through mini sdLarge for everyday use and since back is so slippery is hard to hold securely unless you have a case.Conclusion:The more I use it the less I like it.This doesn't do much more than a Palm Pilot and the palm can fit easily in your pocket or purse, has onscreen keyboard, graffiti, wifi, sd slot, Bluetooth, real word and excel software, email, built-in calculator, eReader, music, etc.  Too bad they are no longer available except on eBay.However, if you want a 10" screen then a netbook is much more useful.  A real OS, flash support, large hard drive, screen can be adjusted for optimal viewing, USB ports, and the list goes on.  Portability is not much different and you can get a lot more for your money.  Price is another plus.I would never have bought this for myself.  As I finish this the battery is at 56%.  Typing this has been tedious and draining.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and Useless, At The Same Time!
Reviews.Author: brYsturr
Reviews.Content: While the iPad 2 is indeed the coolest gadget to own at the moment, it hardly does anything productively. This is not to say I do not love my iPad 2. I use it to watch Netflix, type company notes, play games, and occasionally listen to music on it. That is precisely where I find the problem. I use it to do things I do perfectly fine on a computer or laptop. I can watch Netflix, take notes, game, music on my computer and it does an even better job! The truth is, I often have to find an excuse to use my iPad 2 instead of getting on my laptop.So why iPad 2? Because it's a luxury item and everything looks more beautiful on an iPad 2. At least that's what you'll convince yourself, well, I did...

Reviews.Title: Great for games, entertainment, not so much for productivity
Reviews.Author: theniner
Reviews.Content: Hardware:The design of the iPad is exceptional with smooth curved edges and elegant textures of soft-touch metal. One problem that is apparent and has been stated multiple times is the weight of the device. It is too heavy to hold comfortably with one hand and the wrist may feel sore or achy after long periods of use. At the time of release, the screen was good enough for the average person to use. However, now with HD screens on devices less than half the size, the iPad's screen is seeming to pale in comparison. In addition, the battery life is quite exceptional. It lasts for weeks in Standby mode and also for long duration while reading or watching movies. Another point is that the cameras on the device are extremely poor, the resulting pictures looking too pixelated to view. You can forget about low-light shooting, because of a lack of flash and a poor image sensor.Software:iOS has always been a novel user interface, not for the unlimited functions, but for the extremely easy to use USER INTERFACE. Heck, I have seen kids not even 2 years old who know how to unlock and play their favorite games on the devices. The app store offers an abundance of games, and "productivity" apps. However, these productivity apps are not that easy to use. Lots of fonts supported by Microsoft Word do not work on these apps and the formatting is often completely messed up when transitioning from my laptop to the iPad. Apple needs to get Microsoft to build a preloaded app that will be accessible from other places in the OS.Overall:It's hard to recommend a product which is primarily limited to games, but if you're looking for an entertainment device, I would recommend the iPad 3 or 4 which have better graphics, a better processor, and a better screen. For the price, this is a good buy.

The new Ipad 2011 still has a few minor issues but absolutely nothing to be concerned with. The new Ipad is so far above and beyond any other tablet out. One of the other cool things about the Ipad 2 is that it is similar to a regular laptop computer when it comes to updates. The new Ipad updates are sent to the tablet automatically, but you can also go online and get additional updates. The new Ipad 2011 also offers some sleek new designs in its covers. Reviews.Title: Slick!

The email client and address book are integrated, so I can easily update email addresses in the address book.  It's sleek and smooth and nice to touch.I had a little trouble figuring out iTunes to start with (because I was trying to download Plants vs. Zombies before completing the OS update and other setup tasks).  I still haven't figured out how to force synch.  And it bugs me that everything goes through iTunes -- I want to be able to drag and drop files to it from my computer.The default keyboard utility is useless for any kind of coding -- I've ordered the ZAGGmate keyboard case.To summarize:  this is a giant lump of awesome that comes with some minor irritations.

Reviews.Author: drGunter
Reviews.Content: I had the earlier I Pad 2 but without the 3 g. The performance with the 3 g connectivity is outstanding and worth the sdditional cost.

Reviews.Title: Over-rated but OK
Reviews.Author: hjgreg
Reviews.Content: I own a Nook Tablet, Kindle Fire and an ipad2.I would have to guess that most of the people that rate the ipad2 5 stars have not tried other tablets,Maybe you will like the ipad -- it has more apps in its store, but it also is slow compared to my Kindle Fireand lacks the customization options of Android,Apple products I have owned have malfunctioned after a few years (2 if my 4 itouchs')Not having Flash Video is a major shortcoming -- most videos online are flash -- so you will be disappointed when videosdon't play.Ipad does have a nice big screen, but no USB port, no memory card slot, average cameras and a VERY HIGH price.I bought mine because of the hype and I was curious.My advice is to check them all out before you buy - I would not have bought mine -- it is OK but over-rated with many shortcomings

Reviews.Title: Neat but not very useful
Reviews.Author: B. Omdahl
Reviews.Content: After using the iPad 2 for about six months I can definitely say that I can't wait for the Windows 8 tablet to be released. The iPad 2 is a neat toy but it is too limitd to use for any productive purposes. Number one on the list is no Flash. I can't even tell you how many times I've had to put the iPad 2 aside and grab a Windows laptop to look at a Web page. At this point, if I want to be productive I grab a Windows laptop. If I want to play games I grab the iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: Why?
Reviews.Author: Random Walker
Reviews.Content: Why pay $450 here when you can get a refurbished iPad2 directly from Apple for the same price with Apple warranty, etc.?

Reviews.Title: Andriod Does...
Reviews.Author: AMGesus
Reviews.Content: I use my Xoom for grad school everyday and I love it!  Let me say that my wife has an iPad, and I like it too.  However, iOS feels like training wheels and Honeycomb feels like the real deal.  Android is more like an actual computer while iOS feels like (and is) a giant phone.  I can do things like download Power Points directly to my device and open them using Docs To Go.  What good are 10,000 apps if they are all games?!  I have not discovered anything yet that my iPad colleagues in school can do that I cannot with the Xoom, but only Android has widgets, multiple desktops, Google integration, the list goes on and on...  Honeycomb is getting new apps everyday and you are free of Apple's restrictive environment.  Plus, Ice Cream Sandwich is going to polish off Android and take it to the next level.  Take it from me, if you want open accessibility, maximum customization, and the slickest OS, you want Android.  MOTOROLA XOOM Android Tablet (10.1-Inch, 32GB, Wi-Fi)

Reviews.Title: Refurbished i-pad 2 purchased from Bargain Devices
Reviews.Author: Mirella Augusto
Reviews.Content: This is a refurbished item and it started having problems on the same day the return window expired; the rotation feature is broken and I will have to get it fixed at my cost because I have been unable to contact the vendor. When the item arrived it didn't include any type of warranty. So I now have a one month old i-pad that doesn't work properly. I am not prepared to give a positive review and I do not appreciate the difficulty in contacting the vendor directly. This is Bargain Devices, sponsored by Amazon.UPDATEActually it turns out that all I needed to do to correct this problem is to reset the i-pad to factory standards using i-tunes; the apple people were patient and helpful and it didn't take too long.  Apparently this is a common problem but fairly easy to solve. I am now very happy with my i-pad

I probably needed to find a teenager to show me how to use it.If you did not grow up with computers, or like me, older,but only familiar with Windows I would suggest finding someone to help you with the I Pad (just in case)

The Ipad2 was purchased as a gift for my daughter and she is thrilled beyond belief.  Thanks Amazon for making things easier is this crazy world.

Reviews.Title: They will have to pry this thing from my cold, dead fingers.
Reviews.Author: Dan Williams
Reviews.Content: I held out a month or so before making the decision to buy an iPad2 32G model. After a month of frequent use, I must say it is the nearest to perfection piece of technology I have ever owned. For context, my use is casual non-pro reading email, checking out Youtube, reading my favorite websites, and playing games. All of these are better than on a PC, Mac, or Ipod Touch, all of which I have experienced and own. Being a guy in his 50's, I like the ability to read with finger swipes, and adjust the font size to suit my eyes. I like the Flipboard app organization of articles I read. I like the expanding selection of strategy games like Ticket to Ride, Civ, and Knizia's games. I find I prefer using this for email over my Mac, because of speed. I like saving pdf files in a "bookcase." I like Skyping, although my Mac is better at keeping my mug in the shot. I like showing my pix on it's big screen. The battery really does last 10 hours.Since getting this, my usage split has gone to about ~20% Mac Book Air, ~80% iPad.Now, if I could just figure out iMovie to edit my videos...

Reviews.Title: IPad Problems
Reviews.Author: Wilkie
Reviews.Content: We bought the I Pad2 from a big box warehouse store.  The sales person owned one and loved it.  She demonstrated it convincingly.  Our experience has been different. It is difficult to operate.  First it is hard to get acquainted with.  Few instructions come with it.  One has to find the information on line.  It is a lengthy PDF file that is not user friendly.  One needs to read through it carefully.  It took a while to find the on switch.  When it opened there were no apps on the screen.  With no information it took several minutes to learn by trial and error how to slide the screen to find them.  Synchronizing with one's computer is not explained except in several different sections of the instructions.  Getting connected to a wifi router is another mystery to be solved.  There are thousands of "free" apps that turn out to be advertisements to buy what you really hoped for in the download.  Books are difficult to down load and don't appear on one's bookshelf but are in various locations.  Paper books are more appealing now.  I can share a paper book.  Though it costs more it gets more value out of it.  The "10 hours" of running time is really 10 hours unplugged.  Over all it is frustrating to use and not worth the price.

I think its great, nice design, and fast duel core processer. If your friends are just begging for you to buy an ipad, go ahead and buy it. But if you really want a nice tablet, I would recommend a samsung galaxy tab 10.1 [Which is personally my favorite android tablet on the market], asus transformer prime, acer iconia a500, or the HP touchpad. In all, im just not an apple fanboy.

Reviews.Content: I got this in June and loved it...for a while. This is one of those things that is WAY overrated just because it has an apple on the back. It isn't all that great. You could get a good Android tablet for half the price of this. Even if you simply MUST have Apple products in your home, don't get this. iPod Touch is the same thing but smaller, and iPhone 4 is the same thing except for the ability to call, text, and having a smaller screen, which isn't that much of a disadvantage. If you're gullible enough to still want an iPad 2, at least get the 3G model...maybe that's where I went wrong. I only gave the thing three stars because others might have completely different opinions than I do.

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad 2 VS. Galaxy Tablet 10.1
Reviews.Author: Mario R. Corbin
Reviews.Content: This review is for the general public looking for something easy and fun to use. I am not a techie and have never owned a tablet until yesterday when I purchased a Galaxy Tablet 10.1. I loved this tablet but sadly had to return it this morning when I learned that I was lied too about its ability to connect with a VGA projector. After returning the Galaxy Tablet 10.1 this morning because of its inability to connect to a VGA output I found myself reluctantly purchasing an i-pad 2 16gb tablet. I wish I had never returned the Galaxy Tablet 10.1!! In terms of usability the Samsung Galaxy Tablet 10.1 was super easy and within minutes I was sending off emails using voice control, etc... however the I-Pad 2 left me flustered all afternoon long and I am still in shock at how complicated and convoluted getting things to work on it is. For instance 1) Before I could download anything needed for work I had to up-grade the OS! 2) Once OS-5 was installed I bought three (3) apps - keynote, pages, some PDF reader and I also installed Netflix for free. I had to uninstall and then re-install all four (4) app's in order to get them to work properly! Then, it turns out that the i-pad 2 doesn't actually charge whilst plugged into the computer via its usb port?! The battery life is not ten hours either! After five hours of feverishly trying to figure this thing out I was way below 30% battery life! I found the applications very frustrating to access and EVERYTHING forces you to use APPLE "something or another..." be it music, files, pictures, etc... if you like having options than avoid the i-pad... it leaves you feeling like you have been run over after all of the new accounts you have to set up just to get it to turn on properly out of the box.Compared to the Galaxy Tablet 10.1, everything was super easy to use and ready to go. It also comes with Polaris Office which is just as nice as keynote and pages in my opinion and it is FREE! I wrote a review about the Galaxy Tablet 10.1 expressing my disappointment that Samsung is being so short sighted about not having an VGA adapter for it. However, I could find no fault with the tablet itself or its applications. It left me feeling upset that I had to return it as I loved it so much. However, the Apple i-pad has left me so angry after hours of jerking me around that I can't wait to bring it back tomorrow and be rid of it. I also have the arduous task of trying to get my money back for the apps keynote and pages... both $10.00 each. I will confess that now that everything is finally set up and once you succumb to Apple's monopoly over how software is transferred from your computer to the tablet (i-tunes - sigh!) both keynote and pages preserve your Microsoft word and PowerPoint documents very nicely and is usable immediately. The Apple i-pad also has a proper VGA adapter for its i-pad... but it is NOT as user friendly as people or Apple itself makes it out to be and has left me wanting to return it regardless. Also, unlike the Galaxy Tablet, it does not allow you to swipe the screen from left to right and limits you to the basic top to bottom functions. The keyboard is inferior to the Galaxy tablet as well. For whatever reason the i-pad doesn't even have a tab key despite the fact that there is a blank space where the tab key usually is on any normal keyboard, including the Galaxy tablet 10.1! Just to type in some of my passwords I have to literally change the keyboard options three (3) times! This is only a problem for people like me who actually make full use of all the keys on a qwerty key board when making passwords and such. The Galaxy Tablet keyboard was simple and easy to use. It was as good as typing on a laptop keyboard! I also found some really great books for free via the Galaxy whereas most of the free books for the i-pad is just crap. Apple should spend more time on perfecting its products instead of introducing new ones every six months!Bottom Line: if you do not need to use VGA projectors than buy the Galaxy Tablet 10.1. I am heartbroken that I could not have kept that one. Leave Apple to those who like it for what it is. Personally, I'd sooner use a Remington Typewriter than the i-pad!UPDATE:I returned this iPad and purchased the Galaxy 10.1 Tablet again and couldn't be happier! I found a way around the projector problem too which is great. My only regret is having bothered to purchase the iPad at all.

Reviews.Title: Remember "The Emperor's New Clothes"?
Reviews.Author: ART
Reviews.Content: It's kind of like having your own casino: there's always that chance that it will do what you want sometime. It hardly ever does, but I keep going back for more because of that chance. Also everyone else seems to love them. I suppose I will learn to like it too. So far it is a device that devours loads of time, and all for the purpose of making it work. If you want a new hobby of playing with a new device, this one is a doozy. If you want it to actually accomplish something useful, I'm skeptical after having it for a month. You can always call Apple for tech support, but my experience was that they were more interested in selling me more stuff. I don't see that that is my solution.

Reviews.Content: I'm underwhelmed with the over-priced & over-hyped Chinese Apple iPad2. Restrictive version of safari browser, no USB port, poor user interface, lack of security options, thousands of worthless apps, etc. Hoping to return it.

Reviews.Title: Ipads have serious shortcomings which they are not upfront about
Reviews.Author: S. Winters "Stephen"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 64 Gb Ipad with ATT #G specifically to help with a trip which I am making to my parents' ancestral town. Yandex maps (similar to Google Earth maps) are wonderful to help navigate in cities such as the one I am going to visit---Chernevitsi (AKA - Chernowitz). Only after I bought the system, I learned that I cannot use these 3D maps because Ipad does not support Adobe Flash. I pleaded with store representatives to give me a contact at Apple to see if there was any way aorund this. The staff say that there is no one else that I can speak to and that technical support will not be able to help. I even asked if there was someone perhaps in Russia who deals with Ipads who I could speak to. Apple reps essentially say "sorry Charlie" with a smile..."we are great and everything else is inferior". Well be ware...I really think Apple is a big overpriced marketing gimmick.

I have nothing against itune, but the support on window systems really sucks and upgrade it is a nightmare, with bulky download. In this new device centric + cloud computing world, what a stupid idea when you need to sync your device with a dumb PC?? Totally brain dead

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Andrew B.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product awhile back, and I just have to say, this is a HORRIBLE product. The durability of this product is a durable as a wet paper plate. It couldn't even withstand the ONE bullet I shot it with. I have never seen such a weak and easily breakable product. Until you make your products more bullet proof, I will not be buying anymore Apple products. Even my tv worked after one bullet wound. Pick up the pace Apple.

They are trying slowly release few features with every revision so not to run out of bullets.

Reviews.Title: Scratch Resistance
Reviews.Author: robertlpedros
Reviews.Content: The scratch resistance of the Xoom is very good: 100 Millinewton (mN).The scratch resistance of the iPad 2 is very bad: 6 Millinewton (mN).This specific criteria - the scratch resistance - is one of the most important points for tablets and at least a knock-out criterion for the iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: Please add flash.
